Reviews.Content: the sound is not very good, I love the screen it works pretty well, but I've had connection problems when the  wifi signal is not near enough, but other tablets around  have not that problem, the camera for video calls works excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - price vs features
Reviews.Author: Patrick W. Corkill
Reviews.Content: While there may be better tablets available, for the money this one seems to be the best bang for the buck. It does everything I wanted or needed, although the SW store you go to get new free applications is not as robust as it could be.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Fernando Núñez Tarazona
Reviews.Content: is very fast, I like a lot and is very comfortable to carry by its size, I like the color and design.

Reviews.Title: Keep freezing
Reviews.Author: DNache W.
Reviews.Content: I don't what the issue with this tablet was but it would keep freezing. The Coby support team was great and did everything they could to help me over the phone but I had to return the product due to the issues.

Reviews.Title: Probably one of the largest tablets for the money.
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Pros: Large screen, ok processor, large memory expansion capability, USB port, and pretty good quality material and screenCons: Somewhat laggy likely due to ice cream sandwich, the SD card expansion cannot be used to install programs (there are apps that supposedly allow you to do this but they have yet to work and yes I rooted the tablet successfully). The backlighting on the screen seams cheap since you can't see the picture at certain angles, the front facing camera is of poor quality and sucks if you dont' have bright lighting on you.

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Ed Groves
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd tablet we have purchased. They do a fine job for the price. Are they as good as an Ipad you ask??  Well compare the price! The Ipad has more apps available, and more features, but they are hundreds of dollars more!If you want to do some basic surfing, gaming, reading, playing videos and MP3s, you can't go wrong with this tablet.  Great 1st computer for teens. My wife even purchased one and she loves it!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: miguel a contreras j
Reviews.Content: it suppplies all my needs according the product and the benefits whos offering i am satisfied with it at all

Reviews.Title: good lightweight tablet once 1mobile installed
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Lightweight fast & affordable!  Initially I waa disappointed because it doesn't come with Google Play & Get Jar is a joke if you want relavent Apps. But since I found 1Mobile it has been a fantastic tablet for the price. I would recommend it highly to anyone looking for cheap tablet. I would give 5 stars except for the get Jar annoyance.

Reviews.Title: Look before you buy
Reviews.Author: Carol Anne Huff
Reviews.Content: I've had it  for a little more than a week now, and am already thinking of replacing it. First, I had trouble getting the sd card in,and the cover to the sd card is a little rubber tab that tries to rip the first time you open it, and then it doesn't stay closed.  It's a good price and I thought it would be good for us beginners. I do need something to to help me read since I have glaucoma and my sight is starting to fail me.  But I also enjoy games and music. However, it seems more often than not the gaming apps can't be supported by the Kyros.  Pick out some apps from right here at the app store and you'll see.  Also, you cannot put cloud on it either.  Now I swear by Amazon, and preferCoby Kyros 8-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 4:3 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen with Built-In Camera, Black MID8048-4 to only shop here. But with the Coby Kyros that's just not possible.  So if none of these things are important to you than go ahead, like I said, it's a very good price. Just think about it first. Or like me, you may end up paying for two tablets in the end.

Reviews.Title: Worst POS ever
Reviews.Author: Brian Lorenc
Reviews.Content: Yep I got this thing as my first introduction to tablet computing and it basically sucks. My iPhone is like 1000% FASTER. It is sooo dang slow it's like trying to load the internet on a 486 computer from 1995, over dial up. I'm thinking of lighting it on fire but I don't think that's environmentally responsible to I will probably sell it on ebay for like $1 plus shipping. The only thing this could possibly be good for is maybe book reading from Amazaon. Oh did I mention you can't use the google app down loader? Only the the Amazon one will work and it takes a little effort to get that installed even. If there was a 1/2 star I would pick that this thing is so bad. $109 down the drain and lesson learned I guess. Save up and buy the cheapest iPad don't make the same mistake I made.

Reviews.Title: It's fine
Reviews.Author: John W. Martin
Reviews.Content: It's pretty much what I expected BUT the touch screen is not very sensative.  Sometimes I have to sit there and tap on it about 5 to 10 times in the same spot before it recognizes that Im even trying to do something.

Reviews.Title: NOT BAD FOR MY FIRST TABLET....OOPS!
Reviews.Author: OLDWISE1
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Coby.  Never had a tablet before...they are a little user unfriendly but I am getting the hang of it.  I did buy a case/stand and keyboard but I am unable to connect keyboard to my tablet as the USB connector does not fit.  I thought they were all standard but I guess not.  I am not sure what to do now except do they make converters from the large USB connector on the keyboard down to a smaller connection on the tablet????  Otherwise I am happy.UPDATE 5/19/13:  Had this tablet a little over a month and....it is gone!  Went dead, no response at all.  I am out a tablet!

Reviews.Title: Cheap but good, sometimes can't connect USB keyboard
Reviews.Author: Luis R.
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of them, they aren't full feature tablets but for basic it's good, their G-sensor is not so good, screen is tricky (it took me a while to adapt to it 'cause it's no 100% accurate and I didn't find how to calibrate), don't have bluetooth but WI-FI is good. Works for Skype. I bought two keyboard USB cases and I had to buy a couple of OTG cables (tablets have micro-USB port and even doing that, one didn't make them work. It doesn't include Play Market by default but it can  be solved by googling a bit or installing other. One last thing, if used for too much time for watching videos, gaming or something that demands high performance, it'll get really hot so I'd not recommend to leave it on your bed to avoid overheating

Reviews.Title: Terrible Experience
Reviews.Author: Clarebear
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mother as a Christmas gift. She used it for a total of 2-3 days, and then the device completely shut off. I kept the receipt and returned it to Coby warranty. It took several weeks for Coby to get back to me. They told me that I would have to send a $15 money order so the company could replace the device with a new tablet.I would never recommend this company to anyone. The tablet is also very unimpressive - the screen and icons are dull and it isn't easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: sasha
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. And for the price it's great. It does all the necessary.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7 inch Android Disappointment
Reviews.Author: CLS
Reviews.Content: It is limited in application. It cannot sync with google apps and therefore a callender account cannot be set and google apps cannot be downloaded. As a result you cannot set appointments and events.  It has only a front loading camera. This makes video recording akward. The pluses are the ereader, the games from getjar which the kids love and the skype app. Apart from these I would not recommend buying it.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOGLE PLAY STORE APP
Reviews.Author: Dena L. Headley "DNA"
Reviews.Content: NOT REALLY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE IT DOES NOT HAVE THE GOOGLE PLAY STOREINSTALLED ON IT OR I CANT FIND IT SO I CANT GET APPS FOR THE ANDROID

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Mayra Mendoza
Reviews.Content: After having bought this tablet, I am wishing I hadn't. I wish I had saved up the extra few hundred dollars (maybe less) and purchased a better quality tablet. It's good if you need a tablet for practicality. I am used to the Apple Store and Google Play, having owned both an iphone and an android. So, seeing only "GetJar" did not seem that bad. However, the app selection is wanting. I didn't think not having access to that many applications would bother me that much, but it's limiting. I can't even download my beloved Firefox :( It doesn't look good and doesn't have the button in the center. I didn't listen to the other reviews, but you should and spend a little bit more for a better quality tablet.

Reviews.Title: Not Play Store
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: The hardware is great, very fast, but doesn t include play store. This means apps in this tablet are not very good.

Reviews.Title: new to tablets
Reviews.Author: Scarlette
Reviews.Content: So far I think I like it.  I am very green on this so I have more questions than answers.  I have downloaded several (aps) games but I don't see them when I go to the aps page.  Under favorites it is blank.  How do I connect with facebook?  I put in my e-mail address and password but it doesn't come up.  I did get e-mail to work and the internet.  If anyone can help me I would appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a good tablet!!
Reviews.Author: That giiiirl "Navyboy78"
Reviews.Content: I after doing much research on Coby tablets decided in spite of the one star reviews on here to give it a shot. As other reviewers suggested after my package arrived next day,i  immediately downloaded Amazon store app. I did this by selecting Amazon store app apk. http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/get/android. That is the link that takes u right to the download. It downloaded fast with no issues and from the Amazon store i downloaded Dolphin hd browser,Netflix (which this tablet does play and well not laggy at all. loads lil slower then id like but movie streaming is seamless.) Yahoo mail app,Aim app, Weather channel app and Angry Birds Space and other assorted apps such as games and Amazon Kindle app for downloading books.All Downloaded with no issues and work fine. This is a pretty good E reader as well. There is a one Second Delay when u switch from Landscape to Portrait view but nothing to complain about. It is flash 11 enabled so u can watch you tube videos it does come with the app already loaded and on your home page and it can play videos from sites like solarmovie.so. As far as Facebook games it can play some but not all. So games like Farmville u will need to get Farmville express since the app was discontinued for some reason for which u can find easily by googling it. The Battery life is a little short as others reviewers did say i get about 3 hrs of battery life before it needs to be charged. Standby time is good however lasting easily 10hrs in standby mode. The camera is ok it is front facing and only 0.3 mp but it does have zoom and can take videos. I downloaded skype and skyped with it and built in mic and Camera are ok not great but  people could see and hear me well. Just not recommended in bright areas it will wash out the camera. The built in web browser is decent but i added Dolphin had which i like better Opera Mini is also a good browser. You cannot get Google Play or app store out of box. You could root this tablet and other reviewers have suggested ways to get it to work i did not try them however. Amazon app store plus other various free ware sites Such as getjar freewarelovers.com etc provide a lot of free apps that work fine. Getjar site is working again not all apps will download but most do and are free.  The screen is clear and bright resolution is very good. It is not laggy at all as of yet and when u type it doesn't have that annoying delay from what u type till it appears in your text block. it types very smoothly. All and all it is a good tablet for the 97 bucks u pay for it. I will update this status if any issues arise after i had it for a couple weeks. The Battery life is Shorter then i would like that is my only complaint as of yet.

Reviews.Title: GAVE TO MY SON
Reviews.Author: bmb8548
Reviews.Content: My son, who is 28 years old, loves this think.  He broke his, he is saying it is MUCH better than his last one.

Reviews.Title: Even Better
Reviews.Author: shirley  reese
Reviews.Content: Loved it and it was good for the price.Could not ask for more.I would buy another when the time comes.

Reviews.Title: Amazon aps
Reviews.Author: Ishk
Reviews.Content: My Coby Kyros 10" is 1.5 yrs old.  I have struggled with it from the get go as I could never figure out how to get Adobe flash on it.  It was very frustrating.Last week I read Amazon's reviews and learned how great the Amazon Store aps work with Androids since the arrival of the Kindle Fire.  So I cleared my Coby (look in the privacy tab) and started over.WOW what a difference!  I can now get everything I want: Netflix, Pandora, Skype, etc.Thanks to so many who talked about it here!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: If you don't need something with a lot of frills and speed then this is more than enough! I wanted something we could take with us on vacations and trips and not worry about lugging around a laptop that could easily break. This Coby Kryos does not feel cheap or flimsy, I was more than happy when it arrived. It is a bit slow on the internet, but no different than a 4G cell phone. The picture quality is also very nice!Also, it does have a USB port, I don't know why people say it doesn't. I just ordered one of the keyboard cases that you can prop up and turn the tablet into a laptop of sorts. The keyboard plugs in via the USB port.

Reviews.Title: A quick tip if your MID1042-8 sucks.
Reviews.Author: P. Cappiello "Gibson Fan"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas present. I wanted an inexpensive tablet to see if it would compare or replace my smartphone or laptop. I found the instructions somewhat confusing and it was hard to set up things like on my other devices. Within a few days it had slowed to a crawl and even simple things like ebay or Amazon took forever. I was ready to either throw this against the wall or put it on ebay.But then.......I went into the setup menu and cleared the cache and cookies in the privacy&security; settings.I also deleted my saved apps.  Then I pushed in the reset button and rebooted it. Voila !!! like magic I had a tablet. Apps ran at good speeds and I was pretty happy. My brother brought over his Ipad mini and I compared the two. The ipad was way faster and felt better, but it also costs more than twice as much. So before you pitch yours , try resetting it.

Reviews.Title: This is a great cheap tablet!
Reviews.Author: Michelle R. Egan
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for about a week now, and I have no idea what all the bad reviews are about. It's perfect for getting on the internet, facebook, playing games, reading, and probably more things that I haven't figured out yet. I got this tablet to get on the internet at school between classes. It isn't as good as a laptop, but for about $115 I wouldn't expect it to be. The only problems I've had so far are (ironically) with the amazon appstore and the tablet has frozen up twice. The amazon appstore gets stuck, and you have to clear the data out and log back into your amazon account. The tablet has only frozen up when I was charging the device while using it. Lesson learned; don't do that. It charges nicely while off or in sleep mode; in fact, it seems to charge faster while in sleep mode. The battery does run down quickly with constant use but I can use it for about 3 hours a day and only have to charge it up at night. Don't freak because GetJar sucks and it doesn't have GooglePlay; get the amazon appstore and 1mobilemarket and you're set. You might want to download Avast for mobile devices; it scans downloading apps to make sure they're not malware and it's free! The 8 inch size is perfect for students; the tablet fits neatly into a backpack and is small enough to use even on those tiny desks some classrooms have.

Reviews.Title: coby kyros
Reviews.Author: mistydavis29
Reviews.Content: Its ok for a starter tablet....but not worth the money! I expected more for the amount...will do more research next time.

Reviews.Title: good product, great value
Reviews.Author: ra
Reviews.Content: Honestly, because of the price, I was expecting less, but I was pleasantly surprised. I am an IT pro, and was able get it on exchange, my VPN, surf the internet, etc etc. I am pleased with the response/speed, hasnt crashed on me yet. Two things, however: you can not get on google play, and getjar is very limited. The alternative: 1mobile. that has lots of good apps. I found a good amount of free ebooks, as well. Can watch full movies on crackle, and even live TV with certain apps. Overall I am very happy with the product, but like anything else, someone can hand you a ferrari and if you cant drive youll wreck it then say the car sucks.

Reviews.Title: Good For Price, Bad Support. Tiny reset button easily missed.
Reviews.Author: Justaconsumer
Reviews.Content: I give it 3 stars because it seems to work great for the price. I replaced my Kindle Fire for this just to get Flash and other Android Apps. It loses a star because it doesn't access the Google Play store, but I found most of the free apps I was looking for on the Good E-Reader App store and some good paid apps on the Amazon Apps store.It loses another star because the tech support is lousy. After a week of using the tablet, it shut itself down (despite having a full charge) and wouldn't power up or reset when I followed the manual trouble shooting instructions. I replaced it with Amazon's return policy, and had the same symptoms a week after getting a replacement. Ready to give up, I called the customer support from the manufacturer, and they didn't have a clue. What neither the phone customer support rep nor the manual mentioned is that there's a tiny paperclip reset button on the side next to the HDMI port. It fixed my power problem. It was mentioned on their website, but it should have been in the manual and the phone support rep should have known about it. I shouldn't have had to keep digging for that answer.The Amazon App store is buggy on it. The Apps purchased from the store seem to periodically uninstall themselves randomly, causing you to have to re-download them. Every time I exited it or shut down the tablet, the App interphase disappears. I had to clear the data and re-register just to get it working again.  And then I had to manually delete the old registrations from my Amazon account online. One good thing about the bug, the purchased apps work despite the disappearing app store interphase problem, which was fine with me because there is no way to sign out of the app store or restrict my kids from purchasing apps once I've registered. I found that an older version of the Amazon app store worked on the tablet, but still didn't have a feature allowing users to sign out, so I re-installed the version with the disappearing app store interphase bug, just to keep my kids from purchasing apps. Amazon needs to fix both the disappearing interphase problem and include a feature to either sign out or restrict the purchasing of apps. The way the store works now, it only restricts existing in-app purchasing, but not the purchasing of new apps.

Reviews.Title: Purchased the COBY 7048
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Rollins "cfpmdrt"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a tablet for about 6 months before I purchased this one.  I must have read every review on Amazon about it.  Some reviews were good and some were just bad.  I was all set to purchase the Google Nexus 10, but the production problems, and even with the Nexus 7, kept me from buying one of those now.  I will buy one or the other in the next version.  I bought the COBY 7048 for about $92.  As cheap as they were listed on Amazon or Ebay.  It is what it is, an inexpensive tablet.  I have found that I can use the basic apps for email, documents to go, facebook, browse the internet without probles.  The WIFI isn't an issue for me in my house.  The size is what you would one handed.  It isn't heavy as I read in bed or watch a video on HBO.go or Netflix.  My only complaint is the battery life.  I get about 2.5 hours on a long overnight charge with heavy web browsing usage.  I would honestly rate this an OK tablet. If what you want is a basic tablet with a more than just a reader, then get this one for the right price.  I also bought the COBY tablet case.  It is very well made and was cheaply priced on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Bummer
Reviews.Author: milton williams
Reviews.Content: Totally disappointed. Camera sucks, apps hard to load, mini usb quit working on third day after slight knock. Most of flash memory used up by os, will not write to my sd card. Internet connection spotty. I would not recommend this to my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: Nice performance and great value
Reviews.Author: Jorge Rapalo Schmahlfeldt
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a Kyros 1125 whose touchscreen was ruined by absentmindedly leaving it for a month in an airtight sleeve right by an open window during summer.  The 1125 had been my workhorse tablet and this looks to be a good replacement. I appreciate the full-sized usb slot added, and having the latest version of the Android OS is great.The frame of the 1125 seemed a bit more durable as the 1042 has a more plastic-like finish in its construction, but that appears to makes it lighter and that is useful for a 10-inch tablet.  The loss of the 1125's various fixed button controls on the face-frame is no big deal as I often pressed them by accident when changing grips while reading.Resolution is not the greatest, but it works very well as a comic reader.  Perfect Viewer was quite fast in both display and taking in a large collection of comics, so the machine does not feel underpowered at all.Aldiko and other useful apps come pre-installed.  No significant bloat.As warning to prospective buyers, while Coby tablets lack the official Google apps and marketplace, the 1125 Kyros could easily have these added by just installing a few files, without need for rooting or any tinkering with the OS.  The 1042 however cannot install Google Play, the Gmail app, etc with similar ease.  I tested instead the GetJar app marketplace offered and found it quite lacking.  Several favorite apps that I had read GetJar carried could however not be found.  Sure, you can get Angry Birds, but no Perfect Viewer, no Cool Reader.  But the Amazon marketplace installed without problem, and so did the SlideMe and GoodeReader markets, so I could get all the free apps I sought.Navigation of the file system is a bit clumsy.  Unlike in my Coby Kyros 7 incher, the file manager did not show me in easy to access fashion the contents of my slotted 16GB SD card.  I had to go and look for it in the "mnt" folder.  Once the apps had the path saved it proved no problem anymore, but I wonder if my having just moved over the card from my older 1125 without cleaning its contents cause that.  Anyway, you have to go up the folders path but you can access the card, just know that it will shown as "extsd" in "mnt".More comments to follow as I work more with it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: m conde
Reviews.Content: The touch screen is a little quirky, but it seems like a good value for a basic tablet.There is a way to activate Google Play on the tablet without being a computer expert.You can do it in about 10 min.  Instructions:1) on your computer download root_gapps_signed.zip from the following website: [...]2) on tablet go to settings > developer options and allow "USB debugging" by checking the box3) connect tablet to computer with USB cable and allow device to be used as external device4) place the root app "root_gapps_signed.zip" in the tablet (I placed in the internal memory)5) rename "root_gapps_signed.zip" to "update.zip"6) Go to Settings > About tablet > System updates > Install system update > From internal storage > Install now7) When I ran the updater, it gave me an error message indicating it could not find the file, if this happens, scroll down and select to run again8) after the update is complete, reboot9) using your tablet's web browser, go to google play (set up the account if necessary) and download your apps.Worked for me and it greatly increases the tablet's usability...

Reviews.Title: excelente compra

Reviews.Content: llego en buen estado y es justo el mismo producto que aparece en la foto, vendedor responsable y con muy buenas odertas en sus productos

Overall pretty good tablet, however I think gogle should rethink letting developers use android without having the licensed versin because most users want acces to goolee play and also other google software. If this tablet had googe play I would give five stars thank you

Reviews.Title: ok tablet

Reviews.Content: its a good size and cheap don't know what else you can expect out of a tablet this size and price. Does every thing my wife wants it to

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Maria Quintana
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the product, but the capacity of the internal memory is not what you say. when connected to the pc, says I have 2GB of memory, not 4GB. Like when I see the memory capacity on the tablet. says 2gb.  :S

Reviews.Title: Quite good - no problems getting all apps working including netflix, pandora, etc
Reviews.Author: APR
Reviews.Content: 10.1 inch 16:9 version.The main bad reviews I saw was the lack of google play and multitasking. The lack of google play is true but it did not stop me from getting all the popular apps. Just search the web for the app you want plus the keyword "apk". Then download and install. Netflix works flawlessly as well as the youtube "official" app, pandora and others. I had them all working within a few hours.Also was able to put all my mp3 on a micro-SD and these play without any trouble.Multitasking: no trouble listening to music while browsing and using other apps.External keyboard works perfect and the tablet (the 16:9 one) has both a full size and micro usb host.For scientists: there is a VerbTex Latex editor that works very well with external keyboard and you can get Anoc app to do Octave (MATLAB) programming. With Connectbot, you can ssh into external servers and edit/run code so you can actually work on these tablets. However, you do need an internet (wifi) connection active for these apps but this is an app limitation so you will have the same issue on anything more expensive.

Reviews.Title: tablet review

Reviews.Content: I like the tablet, however it is a little slow and I had some issues with my angry birds games, had to reinstall two versions of the game. otherwise, it's good. I have to be careful not to install to many apps, otherwise the whole system seems to slow down.

Reviews.Title: Tablet

Reviews.Content: Exelente el producto e igual la atencion!!!Es un equipo muy completo lo recomindo, sobre todo para los que gustan de juegos super divertido

Reviews.Title: great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Likes:  Very affordable tablet that is simple and easy.  Recommend it for those who are NOT power users or not so tech savvy.  I have a few games on it for entertainment (Word Search, Flow, etc) but mostly use it for reading books (comes with reader installed), work documents (downloaded the Adobe PDF reader from Amazon), checking email.  Really easy to move data/music on and off.  Like not having to mess with ITunes account.  We also bought the 9" model and like it just as well.Dislike:  camera is not very good.  Have had some difficulty getting a connection at certain wifi spots.  Also my son had othe same 10" model.  He tried to install some of the bigger games on it and it crashed.  After spending some time on the phone with Tech suport we had to send it back.  (by the way, Coby Tech Support were great!)  He had to end up going with the IPad to handle his gaming-the Android games he was downloading aren't always compatible with the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Tore up in one day!

Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter for Christmas. I was putting apps on it and it totally locked up. The power will not even shut off. She is going to be so disppointed.

Reviews.Content: coby works really good, not as fast as samsung galaxy.but for me its perfect for the price. i cant complain, i love it, honestly.

Does everything she wants, big enough so she doesn't have to squint, and affordable enough to not break the bank.  Probably one of the best purchases off Amazon ever. Reviews.Content: I bought this as I travel to europe once a year and did not want to bother with my laptop...so far it works great, its harder to get free books for this one then it is for the kindle tho..

Reviews.Title: Camera?
Reviews.Author: Just A Dad
Reviews.Content: You should know that the camera on this device is not for taking pictures. The camera is located on the same side as the display. It is designed for video conferencing application but not movies and pictures.That concern aside it is a great tablet for the money. It costs less than a Sony ereader and does four times as much.Four starts for confusing me about the camera.Here is an update: I have noticed that the corners are not as touch responsive as the middle. This is particularly frustrating on the Getjar appstore because the search function is up in the top corner. You still can't beat the value though.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros you can surf the web, but to download music, videos and other applications its says, you do not have any applicatons,

Reviews.Content: Coby Kyros you can surf the web, but to download music, videos and other applications its says, you do not have any applicatons, I assume when you pay that sort of money everything should come ready to go., not trying to figure out how to get the stuff loaded in order to have it functioning.But i do like it, however, I also thought that 10.1 would have been bigger, like a square and not oblong.

Reviews.Title: Good for a first time tablet
Reviews.Author: Kaila Brewer
Reviews.Content: This tablet was my first tablet ever and i was so happy with it. I paid like 172 dollars for it at the time i ordered it but it was worth the money. I can say that the only things i did not like about this tablet was the fact that it does not support Google Play, YouTube videos were tremendously slow when loading, and the camera quality sucked. Since i got majority of my apps from the Amazon App Store, i was ok with not having Google Play. I never really use YouTube that much either so that was fine with me, and also i never used the camera so this tablet was just right for me. All and all, if you dnt mind not being able to use Google Play then i recommend this tablet for you, especially if you are on a budget and want a nice tablet to have. The games i had worked great and the screen quality is awesome. If you want to get a tablet for a child, this is even better because my 5 year old niece and 6 year old cousin LOVES this tablet and never wants to give it back to me :)

Reviews.Title: I love it ...
Reviews.Author: Blanca
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I was looking to download skype and couldn't, I called them and they do not have the license for skype, so I had to return it... but I truly like it.  Skype was the feature I was hoping for the most.  But is a very good product really!!!...

Reviews.Title: As advertized

Reviews.Content: This Coby device does all my wife wanted in a device and still comes in under 100 bucks.  I had a good time setting it up for her.  She can now check email and surf the web without havin to wait until the computer finally decides to finish booting up.  Almost instant gratification.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros tablet

It was less expensive to buy a new one than it would have been to upgrade the original one!This one fills the bill...for now, at  least. In 2 or 3 years, I may want a 6.0 or whatever comes out next but this does all I need to do currently.Thank you for an excellent shopping adventure.... again!

Reviews.Title: Rating

Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for someone and they love it!  I recommend this product as a gift if they want internet on the go.

Reviews.Content: exc tablet for the money... as an e-reader its great, as good as any other tablet... the browser is a bit slow when surfing the internet... but i can read any book easily and even play angrybirds with no delay whatsoever

Reviews.Title: agree with janowbi
Reviews.Author: mandar
Reviews.Content: the tablet was pathetic but if you follow his advice and delete factory defaults and the tablet works great. still little slow to respond when typing but can get all the you would like. and well worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Solid entry level tablet for kids.
Reviews.Author: John from Jersey "network ninja"
Reviews.Content: Let's get this out of the way: average tablet, average score. It's not a Nexus 7 or a Kindle Fire.That said, it's got pretty solid but plastic-y build quality, and the screen is remarkably responsive. The GetJar app store is passable, and the Amazon App Store is worth far more, but what counts is whether you can get the Android Play Store on it, and I'm happy to report that you can.It's a little involved, and I wouldn't recommend it for people that are scared of command line windows, but with a small amount of effort you can have a great little Android 4.0 tablet with full Play Store access. There's an entire thread on it at AndroidTablets.net and the step by step instructions have been posted: [...]You can play Minecraft PE and it works perfectly. No problems with video playback and I can give the kids more storage space by popping in an SD card. I haven't tried Netflix yet, but that should work. I think we'll be plenty good for a preschooler and a kindergartener...older kids would be better suited with a more full-featured tablet.

Reviews.Title: Really good!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Me encantó! Excellent for the price! It arrived really fast! 5 starsOf course, if you want something better, you just have to pay more!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the money!

Reviews.Content: Bought for M-I-L to have access to the internet and email.  Combined with the case with keyboard -- great item.Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Buena por el precio

Reviews.Content: Buena Tabla para el precio.....De tamaño adecuado...De fácil uso, dentro de lo que cabe...Recomendable para ver correos y videos...

Reviews.Title: Nice computer!!
Reviews.Author: DENISE
Reviews.Content: Was nice hardware but I am having to learn the software. It was a bit difficult but once I understand it works well.

Reviews.Title: functional tablet
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: this is an inexpensive tablet that has a lot of versitility but yet simple to operate.  Great for older people thatare challenged by today's technology. Love the case/keypad, works great on wi-fi networks . Would highly recommend for anyone wanting to surf the web, do e-mail or games

Reviews.Title: Questions
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I got the tablet several days ago,it is very good in use.But i want to know how to find and use the micro SD memory card that has been into the tablet,and how to download staffs into the card but not the tablet itself.Since my english is no very good,please help me.

Reviews.Title: definitely has pros and cons
Reviews.Author: Becky Coate "lowerskye"
Reviews.Content: Pros: screen is colorful, easy to use, has usb port/micro sd card slot/micro usb portCons: unable to 'borrow' books from the library, but able to download free booksIt's good for basic e-reader, listening to your own music, and for accessing whatever games, apps, etc. that will actually install/load.  I was finally able to run Pandora with a very strong internet connection and was finally able to install angry birds via getjar.I thought going with the 10 inch size would be the right choice, but now I wish I would have gone with the standard 7 inch as it seems that it would be easier to hold.Also, the usb port is read only- I could not figure out a way to transfer data to or from it.

Reviews.Title: Seems very nice for the money...but read on...
Reviews.Author: George E. Stratton
Reviews.Content: 9-10-2012...I bought this to store and read technical PDF files that I use at my business and in the field every day. It's VERY good for viewing text documents and reading books. The quality seems good and the display is bright and fairly easy to read in the sunlight. The Browser is nice..it's tabbed for multiple page viewing. And having the 10 inch screen has it's advantages. I seldom have to zoom in to read something. I do have trouble viewing flash video in the browser...it just won't do it or I haven't figured it out yet. It does come with a You Tube viewer though and it works nicely. Of course it's being an Android system there are many apps that are fun and useful...you just can't download them from the Google store. Doesn't make sense to me...it's (Google) Android for pitty sake. It just says that it isn't an approved device. Thank goodness for Amazon's Appstore for Androids. You will find most anything you need there. It is a little thick and heavy as tablets go. It isn't an iPad for sure but it works for me...and at a great price, too.5-21-2013...After using it for a few months I have changed my rating from 4 to 1. It was OK as far as reading books and documents, and playing most apps. I had some problems with it though. It gets to where it takes 2 - 5 minutes to load a web page. I called Tech support (no problem getting through)and they told me to try a full reset. I hated to do that because it meant that I would have to re-install ALL of my apps but I did it anyway. It worked so I was happy with it for a short while until it started doing the same thing again. I called them back and they sent me a email explaining how to return it...to include the receipt and a $15.00 money order for return shipping. What really gets me is they state that it will be 6 to 8 weeks to process the claim...WHY SO LONG? It's been 3 full weeks since they received it so I just called and they told me that it still hasn't been entered into the system and that it will probably be a couple more weeks until it does. I'm sorry...that's just unacceptable. Well...I hope I get it back someday. In the mean time I bought a Samsung Galaxy 2 and am enjoying it immensely.8-14-2013...I wish there was a minus star that I could check. I will never buy another Coby device again. It has now been almost 4 months since I returned my tablet to Coby for warranty repair. I WAS able to contact customer care by phone...now even that is unavailable to anyone. You call the PUBLISHED phone number on their website and you get a recording telling you to go to cobyusa.com where the only option you have is to email them...so I did. I have emailed them twice asking them to simply return my tablet. After weeks I have yet to receive even a confirmation that they received my email. I wish I could understand how a company as successful as Coby is could deal with a customer in this manner.I must give Amazon some high praise here. I copied them the last email that I sent Coby. I got an email back from Amazon within hours of when I sent it apologizing for the problem that I have suffered with Coby. Not only that...they have refunded the entire amount that I purchased the tablet for, including tax and shipping. Amazon...you are a class act! I was unable to send return email to them thanking them but I can do that here...Thank you very much. I will defiantly continue buying from Amazon...just not anything Coby.

Reviews.Title: Not Google Approved
Reviews.Author: Oilfield Trucker
Reviews.Content: For the money the quality of the item is self isn't bad, but it is not Google approved and any official Google app such as Google Play (Marketplace), maps, etc. will not work with it.  I even downloaded them and tried to run them.  The apps are specifically designed not to run on this device.  I spent a entire day doing research to root the device, but could not find any way to do this either.If you want a movie player or something for surfing the web, this device is fine for that and with the built in USB port, you can use a full sized keyboard or other devices easily.I would have given 4 stars had it been able to run the most popular apps in the world...

Reviews.Title: Overall a good device
Reviews.Author: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as my first tablet device and then found out after registering that it is "discontinued" by the manufacturer! Other than this litle hickup, everything works fine and is a great little device for reading my schol books or serfing the web or even watching a movie (which I stil have to figure out).Again, this is overall a good little devic!

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: Jenni W Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these tablets for my nephews for Christmas. As they are kids and I am their Aunt and not their Mom, I wanted to get a tablet that would give them everything they needed without costing an arm and a leg. I did research on these and thought this would be a good option. I was wrong. It does not come with Google Play. You have to root the device to add it. You can add Amazon Appstore pretty simply, but every time the tablets are turned off and back on the appstore as to be uninstalled/reinstalled to work. It comes with an app store called GetJar which online appears to have most of the apps they would want. However, many of these are not compatible with this tablet, including Angry Birds. I am returning these. I would rather spend a little more and get them something with more options.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: wayne rush
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a waste of money the touch screen responce is slow and choppy also wick is slow.bate it

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: SP
Reviews.Content: The screen was very slow in responding and some parts of the screen didn't respond at all. It was very badly calibrated, I think. The lack of app support doesn't help either.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the price but some downs
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The Coby Kyros is a okay tablet for the price I wouldn't recommend getting another tablet for the same price cheap tablets out there are more slower than this oneI would Highly recomend the Coby Kyros MID-7042 Because this new Model is More slim but has a Poor Touch response in the sides of the tablet or when opening a new tab.FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A PROBLEM CAUSE OF GOOGLE PLAY. I HAVE THE SOLUTION =) 1Mobile Market most Apps in google market are in this market it. I'll put the Link so you can download the .APk file put in device need a SD Card install and enjoy!! =D[...]

Reviews.Title: Amazing Coby Kyros Mid-7048-4
Reviews.Author: Cloud "Wolf"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Coby Kyros Mid-7048-4 model last week. I was impressed the battery was fully charged when I took it out of the box. That was a thoughtful gesture from Amazon. No problems so far. Very fast connecting with Wi-fi and I already put it 18 movies (via 32gb micro sd) and worked well. It has some apps already installed (basics), but lots of possibilities to advance for more apps out there. I bought this mainly for email checking and watching movies. The battery lasted at least 6 hours of movie watching (surprisingly). The only cons is the resolution, 800 x 480.  This could have been a perfect tablet if the resolution is higher; but for a tablet priced less than $100 bucks, you can never go wrong. I compared this tablet for my Blackberry Playbook which I already own (purchased 2 months ago), this Coby Kyros Mid-7048-4 is faster and more RELIABLE than the Playbook. I only have my Playbook for 2 months and now having issues from it. I must say, not all expensive tablets out there, is really worth as they should. I am glad I bought this Coby Kryos Mid-7048. Highly recommended!!! Thanks Amazon for the excellent service! j,sandiego

Reviews.Title: "Eehh"
Reviews.Author: kysmom
Reviews.Content: Thankfully Amazon allowed me to replace it..... twice.... when it is working it's not a bad tablet for games and simple things. Not very fast internet loses connection often and freezes often as well. Once games are downloaded the work 95% of the time but also freeze up time to time. My first tablet worked ok for about a month then just stopped charging and holding a charge amazon replaced it. The second one they sent me lasted about a week before little white lines began to run across the screen at random amazon replaced it again thankfully. I am now on #3 have had it about 2 weeks now finding the same problems I had in the beginning before the charging problems and same problems as on the second as far as being slow and freezing often. Not very impressed.

Reviews.Title: I really like it!
Reviews.Author: K. Counts
Reviews.Content: This was a late Mother's Day present for me. I have wanted a tablet for a while but to me a table is a "want", in other words not needed if you have an Android phone and a PC. I couldn't ever justify buying one for myself so my wonderful Hubby did it for me!I got the tablet 2 days ago. I am not sure why other people can't download the apps that I have but here is what I did. I opened it up and charged it for a few mins. Then I connected it to my home WiFi with no problem. I d/l Dolphin browser, Amazon App Store, Netflix, and several other apps from amazon.I restarted the Tablet and checked Netflix to see if it worked and it did no problem. Kindle worked and all of the other apps worked. I noticed several reviews stating that Netflix and Kindle wouldn't work and I am not sure why they had problems.The only downfall I see is that the internet is slow and freezes a lot when browsing. I'm not sure if it is the tablet or my internet. I am thinking my router is going bad so that may be the problem. I am searching for a solution online and will update when I figure out which is which.No you can't have Google Play Store but Amazon App Store, 1Mobile, and GetJar are sufficient for me. I have Google Play on my EVO 4G but rarely use it as I prefer Amazon. Amazon also has the Free app of the day and I have gotten many high $$ apps for free from them. IMHO Google Play is overrated.My Man paid one hundred ninety-five dollars for this tablet and I think it was definitely worth it! I would recommend this to anyone wanting a reasonably priced tablet -  totally not worth $400+ for others when you can get this one.I have read you can root and add a Titanium Rom to these tablets to make them run smoother and process faster. I feel sure I will do this someday when I read enough about it to understand how to.

Within a month, one of them would no longer load apps for do much of anything. I called Coby Repair and they had me do a master reset. The tablet then had no internal memory at all.  They then told me to mail it back with a $15 money order to mail it back.  Well, I mailed it out in the beginning of February 2013.  I got a replacement tablet back in the mail in JULY!!!!!! Ridiculous!!! Now, nearly a year later, my other granddaughter's tablet was doing the same thing where it wouldn't download apps or do much of anything and now it won't even turn on! Grrrrrr! I will NEVER buy from Coby again!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: willi
Reviews.Content: Okay, I've had this little gem for about 5 days now. I was looking for a ten inch tab, but didn't have a lot of cash. I already have the Acer Iconia A-100, which is a great tablet. But i wanted a 10 incher. When i first got it, it ran fine but there was no Google App Store, bummer, So I got the Amazon App Store. everything was working fine but when I loaded Netflix it didn't work, the app loaded fine but the screen would just go blank. I called Coby Customer Service and they said it was a problems with Adobe flash not running right? Anyways, with Coby you actually get a live person however, you may not get one that knows anything. So i looked around on the internet and found that this is a problem with the tablet. I also found a solution. A tech advised to reboot the system and erase factory files. Here is the message ---- "Power the unit off (holding power buttom) and selecting Power off, then hold simultaneusly back button and on buttom 8 seconds,when the android icon appears press the back button, in the menu select wipe data/factory reset pressing home buttom and then press back buttom, in the next screen select "yes delete all user data" pressing back buttom, and in the next screen select "reboot system now" with the back buttom and wait. IT WORK FOR MY TABLET." ------After doing this download the Good e-Reader app store through Getjar. The Good e-Read app store has everything. Netflix now works great on my tablet. I was also able to down load pretty much every app the Google Play Store has. They even have the Google Play Store app. Anyways, after doing this my tablet runs smoother, seems to be faster and everything works. Took this tablet from a 3 to a 5 star. I now love this tablet. Oh, when doing this it will erase things (music, pics, videos) on the tablet but not on the SD Card.

Firstly, Gogeek USA did not have the product. A sales representative called and told me they do not have the 4GB and suggested a less memory with an addition of 4GB sd card. I end up getting the wrong product and GOgeek refuse to send me a replacement until they have the  product in their hand. The replacement product DID NOT come with a Built-in camera as the incorrect one was sent to me. As a novice to these devices,little did I know that you cannot save any games on the these SD cards from off the net as the tablet will not allow you to and the sales rep did not explained these cons to me. This was a problem because it defeats the whole purpose of my objective. Secondly, Gogeek customer service was extremely poor. These guys just seems to buy these product and resell them with no profession advice on the product. Thirdly, the Coby product does not come with Googleplay software which allows you to down loads games on the table. I have to pay over $50 bucks in addition to the cost to have these sofwareS loaded on the table because the cost of reshipment to Gogeek USA was too much. I reside out of the USA. Reviews.Title: Simple tablet works ok but not very sturdy
Reviews.Author: AeroEngineer
Reviews.Content: I needed a replacement for my mint condition but frozen kobo touch ereader and was certainly not going to give that company my business again and after seeing the prices for limited e-ink readers versus full fledged tablets it's no contest. The major thing is that tablets need a lot more charging than e-ink readers do. I had an Android smartphone a while back before deciding it wasn't worth the monthly plan charges so the OS wasn't a problem. So the Coby Kyros seemed to fit the bill for my needs: it comes with Aldiko ebook reader already installed so I don't even need to be online to get my main use out of it. It's relatively cheap too. It's easy enough to plug into my PC, load up my music, ebooks and movies. I had no major issues with the software as I only wanted an ereader functionality everything else was bonus. There was some stutter here and there while reading books and it would not import some larger pdf file books with lots of pictures but this could be an Aldiko thing. I ran movies and music off my 32gb micro sd card as there's not much room for a lot of those type of files on this, no problems running any of that.I was able to put most of my epub library on there no problem. Aldiko was fairly easy to import my books into once I knew which folder to put them in so it would read the books. I found it to be great for epubs, not that great for pdf's. I particularly liked the feature where it switched the exposure on screen for night reading as it's much easier on the eyes and probably uses less energy since most of the screen is black other than the words. The 16:9 aspect ratio is not the best for holding this as a book for long periods of time I have to say. Also they put the power/vol buttons right where you hold one side of it when in portrait mode for reading, not the best thing but it's not a deal breaker either. It does seem to kick the heat out around there too as my hands got sweaty while reading.I can't comment on the internet part of this since I don't have wifi at home and never needed it while I owned this. The touch screen was pretty responsive. The micro USB port needs to be better positioned as it EASILY gets knocked out while plugged in. I also didn't see a "charging" symbol when it was plugged into the PC via USB so I'm not sure if it was charging that way or not, it did fine with the dedicated charger though.I received it from warehouse deals and it was supposed to be in like new condition. Well it was not, the plastic case had a crack down the back that was already half way down and so I returned this for a refund. Coby needs to either use harder plastics, metal or work on their structural design for this item. I went ahead and got another brand and model in the same price range as this one that also has an ereader app as well as has Google play store pre-installed. Pass on this and get a play store item that's designed to be more sturdy for not much more in price. I'm using an efun/walmart nextbook 7" for the same price brand new as this tablet is used and it's much more sturdy with 8gb of onboard storage and google play, much better.

Reviews.Title: customer service does not exist
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had to send my tablet in to be repaired.  Coby received my tablet on 4/22/13, but I have not received it as of yet.  I was told it would be 4-6 weeks but here I am 3 months later & cannot get a reply from anyone from Coby.  Maybe I'll get hold of the BBB.

Reviews.Title: DON'T DO IT
Reviews.Author: K. K. T. Coyle
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet on sale through Verizon, I had it for a week, tried to plug it in via USB to my computer, it turned off and would not turn back on.  Verizon ordered a new one for me because it was under 14 days (Thanks for the good customer service Verizon).  I got the new one and immediately locked myself out (don't change your pass code late at night before you go to sleep).  I spent a week trying different combinations, found it, went to plug it in so it would not die as I was changing the pass code back to something I could remember, and it went dark again. Verizon couldn't take it back again, now I get to mail it to Coby at my expense with $15 and I suspect I will not be getting a refund.  I don't really want a replacement at this time, there must be a design weakness near the power/usb outlet. I can't get one to work for more than 3 days.  I will update when I find out for sure.  If you absolutely must try this out, get it from amazon, then it can be returned easily.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase
Reviews.Author: LaTania
Reviews.Content: I have ordered many products from Amazon and by far this is the worst.  On the 29th day the screen displayed everything backwards.  When I finally contacted Amazon they told me that my 30 day warranty had expired and I needed to contact the manufacturer.  It took 5 days to get them on the phone because thier voicemail was always full.  When I finally got someone on the phone their system was down.  They took my info but called back  three days later. After that time I had already spoken to a rude employee by the name of Bryan.  Basically he told me that they arent going to send me a new tablet, and people shouldn't expect this product to work like the Ipad.  There are other issues like the Getjar app which does not have a lot of the good apps.  I am just upset because I purchased this so that my sick mom could be entertained as she tries to heal.  I am out of 100 dollars and left to purchase another tablet.

Reviews.Title: The tablet is ok.
Reviews.Author: Mom1969
Reviews.Content: The tablet is pretty good for the value, but I wish I had purchased a more popular brand name. My granddaughter is having trouble downloading certain apps.

Reviews.Title: Build quality hurts an overall decent tablet.
Reviews.Author: Andrew F. Vrba
Reviews.Content: The 8-inch screen is just the right size for gaming, and its HDMI out allows you to use the tablet like a proper game console! Its reasonably fast for the money, and it has a decent battery life. However it has some issues. Because most apps won't allow you to install to an external SD card, you are STUCK with the meager 4gb of storage space. It has NO out of the box Google Play support. This can be remedied, but at the risk of possibly bricking your tablet. While it plays most of Glu Mobile's swankier games just fine, you won't be playing larger, beefier games, due to the limited specs and low storage space. So don't get this tablet if you're wanting to play the likes of NOVA 3 or the Modern Combat series on your big screen. Mine developed a glitch that kept disabling the internal storage, and eventually had to get a refund. That might not happen to everyone's, but buyer beware.So there you have it. It's not the best tablet out there, but if you want a mid-level gaming tablet, you could do much worse!

Reviews.Title: 4 in 10 chance of total failure
Reviews.Author: Camille Pagee
Reviews.Content: We purchased a batch of 10 for use in a small office. 3 out of 10 had "episodes" of going to an all-white screen and needed to be reset within the first 2 days of very light use (we used them to browse Internet only). We were able to revive 2 of them but the 3rd is a $130 brick, returned promptly. A 4th had the white-screen thing briefly but seemed to recover itself after a long charge. However this one is practically unable to connect to wifi unless you are standing within arm's reach of the router. Forums I browsed seem to feature this complaint regularly.When working, the display is fine and the 'feel' of the device is otherwise deceptively good. However you have a high probability of wasting a trip back to UPS to send it back. **UPDATE** on the same day I wrote this, a second tablet went completely dead. So that makes 2 completely dead at under 1 week of use, 2 that had near-death experiences.

Reviews.Title: I would return this crap if I could
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was bored riding the train during my commutes. Let's get this straight from the begining, it say Android but it can only download very specific items from it's own websites/app site.  So no Google Play, no Amazon where it was bought.  Which means all my Kindle books/Google books or songs can't be uploaded unless you put them on another device and then drag them to the tablet.  If I could give it a 0 I would but it does have the capabilities of upgrading junk, so that should count for something. Even it's music player is very specific, literally I bought a device between the Ipod touch and the Ipod Shuffle.  It can play music and some apps...so I really should be nicer to it but after owning a Kindle Fire and having to work with the Ipad Mini, this is neither one even it's camera is like from the 80's or something blurry.

Reviews.Title: great little tablet.
Reviews.Author: Will pete
Reviews.Content: Unboxed the tablet and started using right away. No problems  at all . For the money you cannot beat this tablet. little water spilled on it and I immediatly put it in a ziploc bag with rice in it and turned it on the next afternoon and not one problem. Very durable. The only thing is I wish I would of got the 10 inch tablet but that is my fault.

Reviews.Title: Great basic tablet--Easy to use
Reviews.Author: cynthia Mostert
Reviews.Content: I wanted a verly basic easy to use for my mother. She is a first time user. This is a perfect tablet for her to start with and she is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good unit for the cost!
Reviews.Author: M. Hershberger
Reviews.Content: I previously had a 7" with only 2.3 OS until it was broken recently.  Found this larger tablet which is an improvement for screen size, not to mention having the latest 4.0 OS!  Haven't really found anything negative about it other than difficulty getting a cover/stand for it.  Finally located the only cover made to fit which is sold exclusively on Amazon for just $14!  It is an excellent case and highly necessary to protect this tablet.  I don't understand why the only large tablets are Ipads, Samsungs, Acers, etc. at $400 plus, then the Coby for $150 or less, and they are all using the same OS and many similar parts.  Sure, the Ipad and Samsung probably operate considerably faster in some applications, but really, to play some games, take some pics, and surf the net I will gladly sacrifice a couple seconds per function by saving $300 + dollars!!!  Considering how easily these tablets can be broken I can't afford the risk.

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Content: It's an amazing itemI love itIt's easy to use, fast and excellent gift to my daugtherThe services is excellent too

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Title: This tablet is exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Iris
Reviews.Content: This tablet is exactly what I expected. Compact, lightweight, easy to use, the screen displays the colors perfectly, with 1GB RAM tablet is fast, apps open quickly. Along the edges the screen is a bit less responsive than in the center, but it does not create a problem. Excellent purchase for little money.

Reviews.Title: tablet

Reviews.Content: i love my tablet, received on time,  will let my freinds know, too easy it was to order, will keep buying!

Reviews.Title: coby kyros
Reviews.Author: phoenix
Reviews.Content: I bought a kindle and a playbook from amazon and had no troubles whatsoever so i felt confident purchasing two coby kyros for my kids xmas presents. They worked fine, everything was okay until last week( 4 months later)i realise i couldnt charge the tablets anymore. Apparently the piece for the charging port on the tablet fell back inside into the tablet. So now its got an empty hole where the charger entry is supposed to be. 4 months?? I dont live in the USA so basically my money is dead.I'll be thinking long and very hard before using amazon again.

Reviews.Title: such a waste
Reviews.Author: Felicia Adams
Reviews.Content: Its what you pay for...was mislead by another review, but FYI the android market is a NO go on this...also its slow, and has become a paper weight at this point for me. Would be much better with a better market. No point in buying a product that's "like" other products if it doesn't measure up... the market doesn't even come close. smh.  Being generous with 3 stars. More like a 2 star, but the seller was great at getting me the product on time.

Reviews.Title: Mine had problems but..
Reviews.Author: Adept Computers "Gaming freaks"
Reviews.Content: I had to return mine due to technical problems. I really liked this pad too. It was big , light and very thin.Booted up fine and looked great on the desktop. Then I tried to run an app and that's where the trouble started. The machine would lock up, make loud popping noises and finish with a white line racing across the screen before going completely off. That can't be right, I thought. :) So I sent it back.If I were sure it was just a random bad unit, I would have gotten another one because I really did like it. Amazon's return procedure was fantastic and I couldn't be happier with that fact.As an owner of a 7" pad I can tell you, if you're going to get one, get a 9-10" and you'll be very happy. After using this Coby I had a hard time going back to the smaller one.

Reviews.Title: WI FI Problems NO Android Market No Support No Android Market  No Android Market  No Android Market  No Android Market
Reviews.Author: Keith Buchanan
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a good deal on this tablet, but I did not do enough research. The weight and look of this tablet is nice. But as soon as I tried to connect it, it said No Wi Fi in range, which was odd since I was within 3 feet of the device. After a day or so and many reboots, it finally connected. But when it connected it was sooooooo slow. Then when I went to try to download my Banking AP, Surprise No Android Market. WTF? Get Jar? WTF is Get Jar? Get Jar is some free ware Store with very very few aps, then when I go to the Colby Web Site for support it tells me they no longer recommend Get Jar, and they want me to use some other piece of crap market store. This Tablet is literally a waste of Hardware, which a few simple fixes this could have been a great tablet.ProsPriceNice Form FactorConsNo SupportProblems with Wi FiNo Android Market

Reviews.Title: Good tablet, could be better
Reviews.Author: DWash97
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for Christmas for my kids. They loved them, easy to use and download games/ apps for 6-10 year olds. It also came in handy for my kids to get onto their school's website to do extra work; reading/ math. I was very disappointed in the beginning  that they could not stream shows from netflix on them, but amazon android apps remedied that problem. If it came with access to google play or availability of more media apps in the getjar it would be better for an adult. I do recommend this for the price for young children as an introduction to tablet computing.

Also, invest in a microSD card because storage is really limited.

Reviews.Title: Sluggish tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I have discovered that the Kyros 9740 performs very sluggishly on the internet. When I compare the 9740 with a Kyros 7048 that I bought in December I find that the 7048 operates a lot faster on the net. I will reserve my recommendation of this tablet for the moment as I have only had it for 11 days and I am still getting familiar with its operation. I would be happy if someone could advise me as to how to get the 9740 to operate faster online. Apart from that everything else seems to be working well for the moment and performing to expectations. It is quite handy to move around with and great as an E-Reader.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kryos 8 Inch Android MID8048-4
Reviews.Author: RTork
Reviews.Content: Looking for an inexpensive tablet for my grand kids, good price and so far works great, netflix works great, they like to play minecraft, works great for that.  Grand kids love it.  The charging jack on the unit worries me a bit, very small post, I am afraid it is not very sturdy, so far so good.The only problem I had was when I installed the Amazon app store, i have never been able to get it to work 2 times in a row.  I have to uninstall the app and then re-download it and install it to get it to work.  Dont think it is an issue with the  tablet, but with the App.Overall very happy with my purchase. I have 3 grand kids, may have to get 2 more in the near future.

Reviews.Title: poor tablet
Reviews.Author: smt126
Reviews.Content: I rarely write reviews, but this item really took the cake. I purchase many items online, read a lot of reviews beforehand and try to make an informed judgement. I wasn't looking for anything fancy, just something to stream some music on and maybe browse the internet when bored. The wifi on this thing is horrible. At first I thought maybe it was where I was using it. I then brought out my laptop and got fine reception everywhere. You can't stream netflix, pandora, or even get the apps to load in any kind of fluid motion. It will work great for 20 minutes sometimes and then not at all for the next hour. I probably spent more time troubleshooting it than I did using it. It was a gift from my wife for xmas, and I told her to get me one with the biggest screen, but for the price it should at least be able to perform basic functions that a tablet should.

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it same day i got it
Reviews.Author: Come_N_Get_It113
Reviews.Content: No one get this tablet. Horrible battery life. That's one of the main reasons i returned it. And camera has fuzzy picture. Getjar isn't as good as google play.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more you will be glad you did.
Reviews.Author: Beverley Allred
Reviews.Content: Cheap, flimsy no Google market. I got these for my daughters for Christmas. They both use my tablet regularly with no problems, but these are weird, they have a different android interface, no swipe. The first time I tried to use the usb port it unattached from the mother board now it won't work and we need to factory reset and are unable to because , no usb capabilities. all it does it flashes through every aps she's ever opened. Crap should have went with my gut an bought the Google nexus ones for twice as much money I bet they would still be working. The one that is still working just bugs my daughters for a few idiosyncrasies it has, her biggest complaint is the camera isn't centered it is in the corner. It has a small ac adapter plug

Reviews.Title: Died after 8 weeks for no reason....:(
Reviews.Author: C. Meo "Bargain Hunter"
Reviews.Content: Coby Kyros 8-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 4:3 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen with Built-In Camera, Black MID8048-4 Great price and Great functioning, HOWEVER, it totally died after 8 weeks for no reason and with minimal usage.(not dropped or scratched)It won't charge or even turn on. UGH!Sending this one back and because I really liked using it I'm going to take a chance on a replacement.Will definitely get back here to update.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: col
Reviews.Content: bought this as a christmas gift. its 2 months old and now it dosent charge. cant use it. installed apps are not that good. need to have more. dont know what to do with it.

Reviews.Title: Limited Apps
Reviews.Author: Julie Daniels
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas, and it is incompatible with Google Play Store (which I knew from reading other ratings), but it's also only semi-compatible with the Amazon App store - I have to uninstall and reinstall the Amazon App store every few days. Also, even though you can get the apps from there, many of them don't run on this tablet. Still, it was relatively cheap, and it still has a lot of apps that do work. If you're looking for something that does everything you want, this isn't the tablet, but if you want to be able to play some games, surf the internet, etc, it works well enough.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Earl D. Joyner
Reviews.Content: I cannot imagine why consumer rating companies haven't rated this tablet. It does everything the manufacturer says it will and has a super-great price tag. I reccommend this tablet to anyone who wants a quality product for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: muy practico
