Reviews.Content: lo compre y me gusto lo unico que necesita es el sistema de android para descargar los programas y juegos

Reviews.Title: this tablet stinks
Reviews.Author: shaun moran
Reviews.Content: this product stinks had it 3 days and charging jack broke avoid at all costs not a good value stinks

Reviews.Title: slow and fragile
Reviews.Author: jacee
Reviews.Content: You need patience to use this tablet to check email and use social network sites. It is also fragile and is currently having problems with the touch screen a short 1 1/2 months after purchase. I'm glad I bought a warrenty, I think I'll be using it frequently. It is a good size and handy to use on the go, fits easily into my purse WITH a protective hard cover, not the sleeve that came with it. I'm not sure if I would buy this again, it was very reasonable in price but I'm not sure if it is even worth what I paid. On the other hand, tablets are fragile...

Reviews.Title: Coby sent back
Reviews.Author: Ed Wallace
Reviews.Content: could never get it to load, never got to use it, I got one at the local Best by, and took it back, then ordered one  from Amazon and it did the same thing. I talked to the customer service rep at Coby and was no help, so I sent it back, I still want a tablet but not one made by cobyThank you Ed Wallace

Reviews.Title: Fun to have around.
Reviews.Author: Gregg
Reviews.Content: Overall this tablet was good for the money spent.  It's got plenty of apps and games to search through.  I've had it for over two months and still haven't gotten through all of them.  Easy to use app store and navigation through the menus.  My only problem is sometimes the apps will say they have stopped working, but they will start right back up.  Inconvenient, but not a reason to turn away from this tablet.  I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Aaa
Reviews.Content: the product works good for my 9 years old , every now and then it freezes and have to reset it.

Reviews.Title: COBY KYROS8
Reviews.Author: Roy Corrales
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, of course there is other models much better that this one but for the price is unbeatable :)

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tanya T
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old Granddaughter, she loves it. If excedded what I thought it would do. I would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: Got this for my granddaughter for Christmas and it was a huge hit.. works great and easy to use !

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Matthews
Reviews.Content: Love this product. I take it wherever I go, if I'm going to have to wait at an appointment, etc, to play games and skype and all kinds of other apps. Excellent product. Rivals the iPad even if I can't get the special apps that you can get with the iPad. Very enjoyable and works great.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Irma Licea
Reviews.Content: When you are trying to watch a video on you tube it takes for EVER to load! Very slow. Not what I expected. Looks good and is very nice looking for the price but your games take for ever and sometimes never load.  Keep saying page not responding. Dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a replacement
Reviews.Author: Lickablepiercing73
Reviews.Content: This has got everything I could want. I purchased this to replace a brpken tablet we had that we spent over $300 dolars for. This is way better and it is actually bigger than my old one.

Reviews.Title: small disappointment
Reviews.Author: sean "sm"
Reviews.Content: this is my first review on this tablet in fact this is first tablet ever hence i must in all fairness choose my words carefullyi recently returned this product to amazon because the wifi suddenly stop working i tried what little i could to get it working but to no avail. i did a factory reset and got nothing, i actually made an inquiry on this site and got two responses that kinda aided mw along in my decision to return the tablet. bearing in mind the principle: you get what you pay for i was quite contented with this tablet what should you be expecting for a tab costing under 200. interestingly enough my wife has one also and currently it works like a dream nevertheless amazon dealt with me in a very timely manner i returned the tablet just as i got it in the original packaging and got a full refund after 33 days which i in turn diverted toward another tablet something called a zto 9" i'll let you how that goes the reviews i read are very decent

Reviews.Title: Not an iPad
Reviews.Author: breen
Reviews.Content: This tablet is only really good for Internet use only. Does not have a good selection of apps. If your looking for hassle free and easy this is not the tablet for you.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: loretta rachek
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet itself. I expected to be able to get more apps though. I wanted to get apps such as snap chat and simple games. It's a great tablet but not something I expected.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Tom Carlson
Reviews.Content: Tablet does what I want it to do, but battery life is short. Does work well with usb case and key board

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: I can say this product if it was the Christmas present for a nephew, a tablet suitable for children, and also to use it to study and surf the internet, I will buy another.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Anthony
Reviews.Content: My husband purchase this Coby.  He likes using it and likes the size.  It isn't as fast as my Samsung which does frustrate himfrom time to time.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: T. Bonne
Reviews.Content: It has its limits, wish I would have spent more for something better. Maybe something a little bigger would be nice also.

Reviews.Title: Good brand for the money
Reviews.Author: Paul R
Reviews.Content: No snob appeal brand. Let others pay for big name. Good quality with fabulous English manual. Good price (not bargain) compared to big names.

Reviews.Title: basic function for the price.
Reviews.Author: Michele Szakacs
Reviews.Content: I would have to say.. .for the price and the basic function I need at my fingertips.  For example: email,music, internet search, and most of all downloading videos and netflix.  It was well worth the price.  :-)

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet But Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: the coby kyros is a good TABLET but is Poorly Built.The Back Is Plastic and the fist time i dropped it the whole screen came of and jammed my button.Also It Is Very Hard to Put Music And If You Buy I reccomend rooting So You Get The Play Store Getjar Has a Small Selection.

Reviews.Title: Low price and low quality
Reviews.Author: D. Walston
Reviews.Content: The tablet was purchased as a Christmas gift and the WiFi didn't work out of the box. The tablet has a cheap feel to it and is poorly constructed as well. To get the WiFi problem fixed and because 30 days had elapsed since purchase (waiting for Christmas), I had to ship the unit back to Coby rather than return it, This included shipping at my cost, and a $15 money order to cover shipping & handling back to me.Poor quality and poor service. Don't buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Good--If you jailbreak it
Reviews.Author: My2cents
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 5 year old son because his father was getting an iPad and we wanted him to be able to have his own tablet, so he wouldn't constantly be harassing my husband.  For about a week, we tried using the GetJar store that comes preloaded on the tablet. There simply aren't enough apps to make this very functional for a younger audience. We researched this problem and saw Android tablets almost always need jailbroken to be more useful.  My husband is tech savy and had no problems completing the process. Now that the google play store is available, it is much better.  The processor speed is great for what we need it. We made sure to be a microSD card for extra storage so we can load his movies onto it. It has been nice for our long car trips!  Well worth the $90 price point.

Reviews.Title: Very limited Apps
Reviews.Author: Robert Sullenger
Reviews.Content: Can't get google play wife wants scrabble can't get facebook app. Wish I would have known wouldn't have bougth it.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Carlos Eduardo Arevalo Anzola
Reviews.Content: muy bueno el día de entrega fue el dicho sin ningún inconveniente total mente r e c o m e n d a d o

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Rachel Anderson
Reviews.Content: The children were so happy with gift at Christmas time. The product was as good as I'd hoped it would be. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Secrets for success with this item!
Reviews.Author: Glen E.
Reviews.Content: I just bought the 10 inch version of this product about a week ago. I hated it at first and I even filed for a return. On a second thought, I decided to research some helpful hints and forums. DON'T BOTHER TRYING TO FORCE GOOGLE PLAY ONTO THIS DEVICE. IT IS NOT NECESSARY. Simply use the tablet browser to go to the getjar app website and download the getjar app. When you get the getjar app, download the "good e-book reader" app. Another great appstore is called mobile 1 app store. Between the three of these appstores, you have access to almost all of the nicer apps that google play has. Mobile 1 appstore has probably the best selection for a google play alternative. Also, get rid of the default browser and get yourself dolphin browser. The default browser is so and crashes frequently, but the problem is solved simply by installing a different browser. Also, the amazon appstore will work on this tablet. Now that I have access to many googleplay apps, I love it.

Reviews.Title: coby tablet 8. "It is a good product and useful
Reviews.Author: Luis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product. Make a good investment.coby tablet 8. "It's a good product, very useful for managing information, comfortable, easy to use and versatile.

Reviews.Title: 2 Kyros Tablets died within 30 days
Reviews.Author: Debbie Baker
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these , one for myself and another for a friend.  They both died within 30 days!!! Just would not power on after being on the charger all night. same thing happened to both about 1 week apart.I plan on getting another Android Tablet but definitely not a Kyros

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Wright-Raymo
Reviews.Content: This tablet I bought for my son home from college. He has a laptop as well but likes the compact size of this tablet and the fact that you can take along with you. Only one minor problem:We couldn't figure out at first how to download aps, which I read on other buyers' comments. That problem was quickly solved. Very happy, well-priced, fast shipper.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Ann Loveridge "a loveridge"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, wish I would have ordered same for me, it's performance and amenities better than what I purchased for me

Reviews.Title: Pay extra and get a Nexus 10 or Kindle Fire HD.
Reviews.Author: Liam
Reviews.Content: I was given one on trade so I have no money invested in this.On that note here is my impression.If you have ever held an Ipad, kindle fire, or Nexus 7 then don't get your hopes up on this thing.This is more like holding an Etch-a-Sketch. It is very cheap plastic and the buttons feel like the buttons on the old Tiger handheld games.Their is no Google Play store just this junky getjar app store which has 1/4 of the apps the google play store has.The capacitive touch is terrible. I spent a great deal double or triple tapping icons so they would launch.Also this is running Ice cream sandwich 4.0.3 which is not too bad, but its not good either considering right now you can buy a Nexus 7 for $200 and it is a much more powerful machine with better resolution even though it is only a 7" screen.Save your money and purchase something else.

Reviews.Title: Nothing good about the coby 8 inch
Reviews.Author: catherine delvalle
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my son and I.. Its often very slow and mine isn't working at all..Hardly used it and it's only been a little over a month.. The touch screen if off. I have to constantly go back because it doesn't direct me correctly the first time I touch the screen.. A complete waste of my money..

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The tablet is alright. But as far as pictures, its not. Didn't like the camera or how the wallpaper sets the picture up. It was too blurry and big.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: k.r.
Reviews.Content: I use this mainly for reading, but my husband has been able to find lots of free apps for this, plus can sync our excel program to load spreadsheets onto it and use that on the go.  Good for watching movies, playing games, and the touch screen is great.  My only complaint is the user manual is not very deep, and you have to, if you have no experience with tablets like me, just fiddle with certain things, like figuring how to get icons off the homescreen.

Reviews.Title: tableta coby
Reviews.Author: katherine garcia
Reviews.Content: Con los dedos es fácil. Con capacitiva, tecnología multi-touch, esta tableta responde rápida y natural al tacto. Interactuar directamente con lo que hay en la pantalla, pellizcar, tocar, arrastrar o deslizar. encontrará algunos grandes juegos en la tienda libre de Coby Android App. Busque y descargue miles de las aplicaciones más populares. Con rompecabezas, estrategia, acción juegos de carreras, y mucho más, hay algo para todos.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: good product and the price is what made me buy it . I needed something not to heavy to pack around at school. I bought the keyboard case with it and this is a perfect set up. It does take some knowledge on how to get around to downloading apps you want ,the get jar app didnt have everything I needed. You do need to install a few different app programs to get arround this issue. If you just stuck with what is on the tablet its pretty boring but learn how to minipulate it and its almost like a mini netbook. I do recomend the key board case to make it more useful, without it i dont think i would like it as much. the tablet its self is fast, volume could be better, and the picture is nice.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Capacitive...
Reviews.Author: maria hilda de nobrega
Reviews.Content: The shipment was a success, the best and very good product. me vino con todos sus accesorios, no me quejo

Reviews.Title: sucks! sucks!
Reviews.Author: Julia Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Total waste of money! i bought 3 for Christmas...2 of them don't work any more. One won't charge and the other arrived with damage! I'm sorry i didn't go to job lot and got it there!

Reviews.Title: Awefully Slow!
Reviews.Author: Joshua M
Reviews.Content: This device was slow to browse and amazon app store is glitchy if you are used to play store. I returned the item within 1 week because I couldn't stand it any longer. I would hit the back soft key to go back a page while web browsing and the Kyros takes so long to go back it makes you think you haven't really hit the back key... so you hit it again. But you really did hit the key so now you go back two pages. This scenario happens alot. Waiting on the Kyros to load.

Reviews.Title: no good game app
Reviews.Author: KLOVE
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet, but I couldn't download the Google store app, so I returned it. I suggest that Google store app be accessible.

Reviews.Title: Internal Storage should be 8 GB
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Kumar
Reviews.Content: Very less internal storage left for users. Minimum 8 GB should be there. GPRS service can also be provided. Thanx.

Reviews.Title: It was as advertised
Reviews.Author: AaZz
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoy this tablet.  It does everything that I expected.  The only set back was the Office Suite Software.  It did not operate correctly, and had hidden charges that you don't see until the product has been checked out.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal.
Reviews.Author: Rob Ferris
Reviews.Content: A great starter for our chidren. Easy to set up and operate. Great price. Looks cool too. I will buy another soon for our family.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kryos
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The Coby Kryos is nice for the price but the battery power does not last very long. There are a couple of sites you can download apps from but you cannot access google play apps.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 10.1
Reviews.Author: T. Brown
Reviews.Content: For the price it's an Okay product. Upside - decent screen resolution, relatively easy system navigation and great for reading. Downside - disappointing the operating system does not allow access to Google market. Fix is download of apk file but a pain for a new product based on Android. Speaker sound quality okay but with ear buds no problem.

Reviews.Title: Buen tablet
Reviews.Author: ogl10
Reviews.Content: Este tablet, es muy práctico para un uso basico, juegos,web,reader...el unico punto en contra q le veo es la camara q es de muy baja resolución y solo trae enfrente...no atrás

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: carlos acosta
Reviews.Content: I did not need a lot of apps or connectivity and product delivered waht advertised, But I was disappointment with was avaialble and still hving issues with downloading. customer service below awful

Reviews.Title: I must do to solve my problem
Reviews.Author: lidia
Reviews.Content: my tablet does not work is damaged, my problem is that I'm in Venezuela and I would like a new one or my money back, I'm not happy with my purchase is the second I buy but I came damaged

Reviews.Title: I am please with this item!
Reviews.Author: NDeMille
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this Tablet!  It does what I bought it for.  It is not limited to only one kind of reading files.  You can download Kindle, Nook and other files!  The only thing that I wish it had was Google Play.  I still need to root mine so I can get into Google Play.  I would recommend this. exspecially if you want to just read or play games!  The size is not too big and not too small.  I believe it is sized right for all ages!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Coby products
Reviews.Author: tawnya
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 different Coby Kyros Androids on Black Friday 2012. Here it is 18 Jan 2013 and both products are defective. I called Coby customer service and they were no help. The Wi-Fi capabilities for whatever reason goes out. Read reviews on Google. Splurge and get a better product. You will save in the long run. I am in the market for a new tablet for school. Suggestions?

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: pablo
Reviews.Content: easy to used my little daughter love it. I recommended purchase this item only thing don't give 5 star is why I can't install google play.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this product
Reviews.Author: Saint Paul mom
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for a Christmas gift for my elementary school aged daughter, thinking that it would be good enough for the games, videos and books she reads, and we could save a little bit of money.  After the initial hassle trying to get apps to work, it was ok (I followed the Q&A; on amazon to set up the app store). But after two weeks it stopped charging and it was a huge hassle trying to get anyone from the manufacturer to respond to my service request.  Now I am supposed to send it in to the manufacturer for repair or replacement, but I also have to include a money order for $15 to cover the return shipping.  Apparently they don't support their product enough to be able to cover the shipping costs for their customers - and no personal checks or credit cards are accepted for the return shipping payment.Incidentally, I also purchased the extended warranty, but they won't cover this because they say it is still covered under manufacturers warranty.  At this point, I just want my money back and to never look at this piece of junk again.Now that the prices for Kindle Fire have gone down, I just ordered one of those.  The cost difference is not that much anymore and I have had a great experience with my Kindle.It was definitely not worth the $50 price difference to order the COBY product.  It is unusable after less than one month.

Reviews.Title: Still learning
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas....so far it hasn't been what I expected.  We are still learning how to download things and at times there are apps that show up in the "get jar" that just won't download.  I believed that this was going to have the google play store and it doesn't.  Still deciding on what exactly to do with it...

Reviews.Title: Our tablet
Reviews.Author: Sheila McCabe
Reviews.Content: We as a family have enjoyed the tablet......We love the size of the screen and are thinking about buying a few more for the house.

Reviews.Title: i like thie Colby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: the 8" is  a bit bigger easier to read and has a larger screen.  Draw back is that there are not many covers for it.I seem to have to charge it a lot.  It is not a full computer and at times that is frustrating.  It would not let me put on 'gmail plus and that is frustrating.  I can get on the internet easily when I am out  and most places it is easy to get online.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: englishoh
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife to read books on because the Kindle white is quite small and only shows one page at a time.  She loved this.  It shows both pages just like a book and is just what she wanted.  The battery life is the only problem.  It's about 3 hours.  So, just about every time she gets done reading she has to recharge the battery.

Reviews.Title: well first things
Reviews.Author: hayes1
Reviews.Content: Well I went and bought this thinking it was a good deal till I got it and very disappointed I am im returning it as soon as possible it always say not responding when my laptop never does frustrating me alot so save ur money I wish I did

Reviews.Title: The product is gtg
Reviews.Author: Limited
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I bought this for my 8-year old.  He found all the games.  Sometimes it drops a regular wifi connection.  But does really good on the road w/a hotspot (strange).  He enjoys it.

Reviews.Title: came just as i thought
Reviews.Author: Brigid Washak
Reviews.Content: Came in the time they told me it would and its everything they said. cahrged it right up and havent had any issues with it. i have to just get use to it because i am an Iphone so switching from apple to android is probably the hardest part of it all

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Chris Eric Albrecht
Reviews.Content: This is a solid but lightweight machine.  Great for browsing the internet, Youtube, Netflix.  Getjar app sight is pathetic.  Poor apps full of adware. Cant use Google Play due to licensing, couldnt get Amazon work as well.  Don't expect too much and you wont be disappointed. Built in wifi seems to lose its connectivity when powered off.  Maybe I should change this review to 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Coby Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tnut "Tina"
Reviews.Content: Well I guess it would be OK really. The only thing is about once a week the thing resets itself and the it's in Chinese. Then I have to go into settings and change it back to English. But then all the Music and Apps were deleted when it reset itself and then you have to go back in reinstall. So I dont think I will be getting another one.

Reviews.Title: ok the the money
Reviews.Author: Nae
Reviews.Content: I find this tablet to run slow. The market isnt so great. Doesnt really any internal storage and needs a micro sd card. I only paid $100 so i guess its great for someone on a restricted budget. If you can afftod a couple hundred more then dont buy this.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Les Beasley
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. .She is a novice with these type of things, but she loves to get on our PC and play with her e-mail, facebook etc. This product has a large screen for her and once she learned a little about it, she loves it. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kyle Esmeier
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my son. It arrived 2 days before it was scheduled to arrive and the price was $10 cheaper than I could get it at the store.My son loves it.

Reviews.Title: Coby tablet
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: We bought each of our kids these as Christmas presents (ages 8 and 11). Love the tablet. I did download amazon App Store like some other reviews recommended and use that more than the Getjar one installed for apps. We were able to download all the popular games. Netflix works well and doesn't lag. Speed is decent. Overall it's totally worth the money. We have had no problems with either one. Camera isn't the greatest but takes decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed it for 5 days
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: My first tablet, finally got myself a wireless gizmo.  Hooked up wifi at my home, was happy with it.  Today I turned it on and half my folders were gone.  I had to re-install a bunch of stuff it "lost".  NOT FUN.  One reason I got a device like this is that I'm an artist and I want to have my portfolio available when I want to show it to people.  Yes, my stuff is online too but simply having the photos available on the tablet was what I wanted.  Now I have to wonder every time I turn it on if everything is going to be there.  Not happy.  ALSO, you know all those cool apps you can attach?  This device doesn't accept Google Play, so be prepared to sit there in frustration as app after app after app says "Sorry dude, this device doesn't support that feature".  DON'T BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: veiwing web pages is slow to load. Tablet wil freeze up when trying to load. Have to wait and start over

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: notatallhappy
Reviews.Content: This product is just not good quality.I purchased it for my grandson for Christmas and he used it for 1 week and it just stopped working.The return policy is clear.No warranty just return if it is not open.I would not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Coby Tablet
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: I figured that instead of always carrying my laptop around, i can now carry my tablet and still have the same features with less baggage. It works good, however, sometimes the browser locks up but that might just be because of signal problems in the area where I live. Good choice guys.

Reviews.Title: Love my Cobe Kyros Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Obie
Reviews.Content: Everything about this product is greatWish the battery lasted longer but otherwise it is perfect for my needsWould highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Good!!!
Reviews.Author: solidr
Reviews.Content: Very Good for the price, if you have kids, this is the best option under $100, of course. Android 4, 1 gb ram, 7" screen. WiFi connection good very good!

Reviews.Title: Worst Tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Benja
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of junk, The app market that comes with it is very small and only has worthless apps. They say to use the Amazon app store but it is very unstable on this tablet and crashes after every 2 or 3 downloads and must be reinstalled. You will be much happier with a more reliable brand such as the google or samsung tablets.. This is deffinatly a mistake to buy even for the price. It only works sometimes and the touch sensitivity is really bad.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Beaver
Reviews.Content: It is not responsive to the touch like a touch screen smart phone, or apple product. I have had to touch several times before it responds a lot. Would not recommend if you have already used apple products or good smart phones. You will get frustrated. Might recommend for kids who have never used other devices. I bought this for my 3rd grader who has used a touch screen iPod, but he wanted a bigger screen. Both of us get frustrated trying to use it because we are used to good quality products. Now he doesn't use it, and has gone back to his iPod. If I could go back would spend a little more for one of the other brands like amazon or google.

Reviews.Title: not so good.
Reviews.Author: Arturo
Reviews.Content: The upper part of the screen has less sensitivity and I have a hard time for it to respond to the touch. It came with no headphones and the battery life needs improvement. I don't like that it doesn't have the google marketplace to download apps, but I already knew that before the purchase, however I decided to give it a try and very often the service is not available.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Author of the Shifters Series."
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and set it up for him. finding some of the apps I wanted was tricky like to get the kindle reading app I had to download an app that gave access to the different reading apps but I got it and the kindle app store on it. I have a kindle fire HD which I love, but this was a great alternative at a much cheaper price. I'm glad I bought it.------- updated Jan 21---------- We are now having the same charging problem as I've seen written repeatedly in these reviews. Amazon is willing to replace, but I'm not hopeful it won't just happen with a new one. As an electrician, my husband can fix it but that is not the point. if this defect can be resolved I would still recommend it highly for the price. oh well.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: Carla Bilardo
Reviews.Content: This tablet has worked perfectly since I got it. It's easy to use and I'm still enjoying exploring it. Long lasting battery.  I highly recommend reading the suggestions offered by some of the very helpful & knowledgable users who comment on this product.  Yes I got googleplay, bookbub, and love 1mobile.com

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros / pulgadas Android 4.0 4 GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Ruben Enrique Sanchez Salgado
Reviews.Content: Se observa de muy buena calidad. Me siento completamente  satisfecho con la compra realizada. Solo que observo que me llego con mucho mucho retraso y fue el punto negativo que le doy a mi compra

Reviews.Title: have to reset all The time
Reviews.Author: michael reynolds
Reviews.Content: And it did not come with The specified 4GB internal memory that was advertized with this product.  It has frozen up on me three times in 3 weeks

Reviews.Title: The Good and the UGLY - DOES NOT HAVE standard built-iin USB port.
Reviews.Author: Iher
Reviews.Content: i am afraid there is no in-between for me.history: i got two of those for family members overseas to do video chat with, check email, basic browsing of the internet, some photos and little music.the Good: surprisingly good performance for an 'under $100' tablet. i personally own an iPad and this just surpassed my expectations in regards to how well it works. the build quality is not bad either. feels sturdy and snug in your hands. it is responsive, loads pages correctly and quickly... email set up was easy. few apps were downloaded from their "G" app - no problem.the UGLY: the USB, they claim they have built-in, NOT. this is a one way, USB-out (male) connection that you can use to connect the tablet TO your computer. kind of like, the tablet is an accessory to your hosting computer. if you want to attach an actual accessory to the tablet - you have to get something, like a keyboard, that has a MICRO usb output, and make sure IT IS Android compatible. #2 - the suggested by amazon USB case/keyboard???? WTH??? another NOT. do not get it. it will have no port to plug it into. i ordered a male to male usb adaptor, does not work with it either. i then got a mini usb version of the same keyboard/case, does not work, as the actual port on the side of the tablet is MICRO USB. NOT mentioned in the description, it only lists USB. i had to spend countless hours online and read bunch of reviews suggesting the class of this port to figure out what it was - because the manufacturer does not say it. i even called them, and their agent would not classify the type of connection this has - she just said, it is one of their "proprietary" ports? WHAT????so, by far, tablet works surprisingly good for $100. deceptive USB connectivity in the description though. one of my tablets was already sent to the family member before i figured out the above, so the keyboard was a waste of money there... i still  have #2 here and am determined to  make sure the accessories i bought for it work - few more days before i get the replacement MICRO usb keyboard/case. i will post an update if keyboard works or not.UPDATE - 1/15/12Finally, i was able to find a keyboard that works with this thing. it is the "DIAOTEC (TM) Synthetic Leather Keyboard Case with micro-USB plug for 7 inch Tablet Computers" which i purchased from here for $13. NOTE: it's the one with MICRO-USB, not mini, not standard, but MICRO-USB.

Reviews.Title: Nice ....
Reviews.Author: smouasheri
Reviews.Content: Nice unit my son likes it, great for the money, does the job perfectly, i recommend it, highly recommed it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Marlon Maurrasse DO80Q24096N
Reviews.Content: OK i love it..in the next month i Will buy an other. Son,i am leaving this message because i received the tablet like New

Reviews.Title: unsatisfied,

Reviews.Title: this tablet is perfect for me

Reviews.Content: A lot of people said me that is better buy a more expensive tablet, but for the money and the utilities that I need, this tablet is perfect for me

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TABLET!!!!
Reviews.Author: BIRDDOG
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS TABLET FOR MY WIFE!  I HAVE TO SAY IT IS EVEN BETTER THEN I EVER EXPECTED.  WHAT A DEAL!!!

En lineas generales es un producto adecuado si se quiere manejar elementos basicos de las tablet y a un precio más accesible.

Reviews.Title: nice

Reviews.Title: Worst tablet ever made

Reviews.Content: I recently bought this crap for my daughter she literally played with it for 3 hours and it became completely unresponsive . The thing wouldn't even turn off. The get it store is a complete joke . This purchase was a complete waste of time and money. RETURN!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: One Freckled Face
Reviews.Content: I did some research on this tablet before I bought it. I was looking for something inexpensive but worked well. I just needed it for some light web surfing and to keep my 8 year old occupied when we go out. Its hard to download apps because it has GetJar which hardly has anything worth downloading.  You can download Amazon App Store and another app store but they kept force closing its extremely irritating.  I ended up returning it after 2 weeks and getting a Kindle Fire for roughly the same price which I love. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone for any reason.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet at a sweet price
Reviews.Author: Brian C. Aguirre
Reviews.Content: This a sweet machine, great price, love it, very handy. We love it. Easy to use, Great for surfing. Nice

Reviews.Title: What junk!
Reviews.Author: Steve Elfrink
Reviews.Content: This was competitive in price with others but this just didn't deliver. It also came to me with an unlock problem. Goobye!

Reviews.Content: Heavy compare to other tablets. get heat up pretty quick. It actually shot down since my son over used it. Now, it impossible to turn off.

Reviews.Title: Things I can't get to work on tablet..
Reviews.Author: carol ahrndt
Reviews.Content: No back camera,  Having trouble getting in Net Flex, Trouble getting a address book, Still working on these..  The info book dosen't tell you how to get things on the tablet..

Reviews.Title: hoping

Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these.Worked great out of box.Unfortunately had to return both.Received one replacement so far so good.Waiting on second one.Amazon return policy was fantastic.Hopefully second one will be good also

Reviews.Title: Huge Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Schultz "poetographer1967"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this because a co-worker purchased one and was very happy with his. The first one I ordered was DOA. The second one seemed fine, but after only a month the battery drains from 100% to shutdown after only 90 minutes on WiFi - sometimes not that long! It does not have the Google Play Store available unless you root it, which would be fine if that was known up front. The available browsers (native browser, Dolphin, Opera) are either terrible, or don't interact well with the product. One of the main reasons I got the tablet was ease of blogging, and the Blogger site doesn't run correctly on any of them. The display is... OK. There's this weird shadowing thing that goes on when the screen tilts even a little bit. I know this is a bargain tablet, but I expect it to at least do the things it is built for, and it doesn't even provide the basics reliably. The most disappointing electronics purchase I've ever made.

Reviews.Title: lOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Kimber Reilly
Reviews.Content: Happy with product! However for somereason can not download google play which has many moore apps for my 5yr old to play then the app that is already installed.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: JULIO ""VILLA""
Reviews.Content: Excelente Calidad del Producto y Buen Precio para Comparar. Tiempo de Entrega en Orden. Esta es una de mis marcas preferidas.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, But...

Reviews.Content: The only gripe with this is the fact that it seems to take forever to charge and not long to have its battery depleted, having to wait until its charged again, just a pain. returning it and will probably get an iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed/ Do not recommend

Reviews.Content: I both 2 tablets for my children for xmas.  Within a week, not even I had to send BOTH of them back to the manufactors. A green line appeard down the middle of my sons tablet and would not go away. The jacket for the headphones didnt work. I would plug the headphones in and you could still hear the music playin thru the tablet speakers.  The headphone jack on my daughters tablet didnt work at all. Besides all of that the apps that the have for games are sooo corney.  No good games. I cant even download GooglePlay on this tablet.  I wish I would have never purchased this table.  WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANYBODY TO BUY THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase

Reviews.Content: First purchase I do hereby seemed serious and responsible ... I recommend it! .. that is why I give it the highest rating ...

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought I was getting/I no longer own this item. it was returned.

Also I thought the tablet that I ordered had the ice cream operating system on it. Did I misread the information?

Reviews.Title: The apps are for kids

Reviews.Content: Having trouble download applications but it is helpful in allowing one than one family member to access the internet at time.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 1042-8

I added 32 gig memory card but did not see a difference in speed.when I restore to factory default it's pretty fast but for some reason after loading games it slows down. however I did download netflix in the movies played fine but just took a minute to load after they loaded the excellent picture. On a 10 inch screen . the only negative thing about this device is you cannot do Google play.

Reviews.Title: Not happy

Reviews.Content: We bought four of these - ok if you want only apps on GETJAR.  You can not download as much stuff as you would think as everything is linked to google play and even though this is an android it wont let you download it.  Me and my husband bought one each for us and our boys.  I can not even add their school work apps they have to go through the internet every time.  The screen and keys freeze up and alway says not responding and you click wait and then it works.  It is not our internet bc everything eslse works fine even our kindle.  I wish we had just got one to try out first!  Disappointed that now we have 4.  Cant watch our netflix, etc. GETJAR is down alot so when it is up u have to download all the games and stuff you want then.We learned a lesson stop going the cheaper way out bc it is cheaper for a reason

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Wisconsin
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift so I haven't used it myself, but she hasn't put it down yet!  So I'm thinking great gift idea without the huge cost of other tablets.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed..
Reviews.Author: Sharon S. White "Beachgirl"
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to use this to play Words with Friends, but I can't get it to work for that. It tells me it is misconfigured..

Reviews.Title: en muy buen estado!
Reviews.Author: luis paz
Reviews.Content: compre este articulo y me parece que es muy util y esta en muy buen estado y llego a tiempo

Reviews.Title: Lame browser
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Every time I try to load a webpage or access a link, I get "Browser not responding, do you want to wait/close" message.

Reviews.Title: As I received this Product did not Come on at all.
Reviews.Author: lorraine marks
Reviews.Content: I sent this tablet to my grandson for Christmas,  Evan though I  order to late and it arrive after Christmas, my grandson was hert broken . The tablet would not come on.. My daughter called coby Coby customer care  they talk her through,  on what to do. That still did not help....

Reviews.Title: Returned this piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: mikob
Reviews.Content: This didn't work from day one. The browser kept freezing and quitting, most of the applications locked up, the camera was terrible, I returned it for a credit.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Brantley
Reviews.Content: Worked well for my 4 year old grand son.  I would purchase again sometime and even recommend to other parents.

Reviews.Title: It is fair...
Reviews.Author: Joan E. Fuquay
Reviews.Content: I had a real issue with the keyboard and typing/correction program. Either I missed some instructions or they don't and should exist.Also I was very disappointed in the available applications. I primarily bought this so I could access the android apps. I already have a Playbook by Blackberry that is app deprived because of the operating system. I was hoping for much more from the Kryos, but, alas, the apps were as scarce and quality much poorer than the Playbook.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for buck
Reviews.Author: Not happy with watch
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 for kids Xmas. Got them about 10 days early and almost kept them. Easy set up. Not a fan of GetJar...Amazon has better apps. Ordered cases at same time and still waiting. Tablets work great and kids are thrilled. Little money well spent.

Reviews.Title: charger sucks and there is no camera
Reviews.Author: rko420
Reviews.Content: To get the charger to charge the thing is a pain ..I bought 2 of them and they both have this problem...would be better if it charged through the usb port. After a week of being used one of them froze up and dosent work at all anymore and the other one doesnt even take a chare so I cant use that one either ...not happy... Only 2 stars for me just because when they did work they were ok....  And wheres the camera???

Reviews.Title: forget it
Reviews.Author: unsatisfd
Reviews.Content: Also tried amazon app store but it keeps stopping and i cant use the apps ive downloaded. getjar is entirely useless. better off buying second hand of a better tablet. taking mine back for a kindle i think.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Sharry
Reviews.Content: This item seems to work well, but I am unable to use a stylus with it and I often hit the wrong button. The buttons are too small for my fingers and my fingernails do not register just like the stylus. I am also missing actions when I use my e-mail account, not sure why.

Reviews.Title: Okay, but it came with the WRONG CHARGER!
Reviews.Author: April Jones "Broadway Girl"
Reviews.Content: The part that you're supposed to plug into the tablet to charge was too big. It fit the headphone jack perfectly, but not the actual charging portion. Very disappointed. Will be returning it.It was a Christmas present and I like the look of it. I just can't believe that they would package it with the wrong charger.

Reviews.Title: Poor Purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: Well given that I live in the Caribbean and the warranty is for the USA it was a gamble for me to purchase it. After 1 month there is a faulty display. When it powers on the display jumps. Emailed Coby for warranty concerns they said its a faulty unit and to return it. The cost to return is the same price if I was to purchase another unit... just to return to the USA makes no logical since to do such because of the cost attached.My experience with this purchase was not a pleasant one.

Reviews.Title: I wish I could give it 0 stars
Reviews.Author: Mandy M Rourke
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet a few months ago.  It never was able to connect to my home wireless router.  Occasionally I could get it to connect to wifi at the library or restaurants, but what is the use if I can't use it at home?  After about a month and a half it crashed.  I called technical assistance and they told me to send it back for a replacement.  After 3 weeks of waiting for my replacement I finally called customer service and they told me it would take "at least" another 6-8 weeks because they were doing inventory and could not access their computer system.  Spend the extra money to get a decent tablet.  This one does not work and the customer services is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Graduation gift
Reviews.Author: Donna Woolf
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son's graduation, he seems to like it, just isn't where he gets great Wifi right now thats his only complaint!

Reviews.Title: Coby
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Was what I thought , Wish I could get Google play on it for downloads.  For the price it's a good Starter.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet but this unit had flaw .
Reviews.Author: R. Walthers
Reviews.Content: Coby Kyros mid1042-8 worked well for a couple weeks and had no problems at first when connecting to USB connector .Unit would go into usb mode when radio button on screen was touched and showed as removable device in Computer directory of my computer .(both laptop & desktop ).  But after I connected after doing it successfully several times ,Coby screen would flash between homescreen and turn on usb screen rapidly till settled on home screen .Lower task bar on home screen showed usb icon and it indicated it was in usb mode .  My computer would not detect it as removable drive . No detection no matter what computer or usb cord I used. Have owned other Coby's and they worked well .Think this was probably just a fluke and did an exchange for another unit of same model.Hopefully there'll be no further problems . I would still highly recommend Coby but time will tell if that will apply to this particular unit.Coby Kyros 10.1-Inch Android 4.0 8 GB 16:9 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen Widescreen Internet Tablet with Built-In Camera, Black MID1042-8 Well I received the replacement Coby of the same model ,and when transferring files by USB I have experience similar problems as with the first Coby . 2 units with similar problems seem a little unusual .The experience with these 2 tablets don't make me want to write off Coby completely . I've not had much problem with previous models of Coby I've purchased . But I'm not sure what the issue could be with these 2 tablets,I'm no expert so I don't know the problem didn't occur because I did something incorrectly or there may have been issues with the USB port of my computers or even the cord. So I thought requesting a refund and investing in a different tablet after some research into some reviews may help me make a better choice and hopfully there'll be no more issues.

Reviews.Title: Very bad applications!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Vera
Reviews.Content: The only problem with this product is that it does not have the Google Play store, to download applications, and can not be installed due to their software. The tablet comes with a application called "Getjar" which replaces it, and is very poor with respect the applications to download.

Reviews.Title: Meh, not as reliable as I'd thought it would be.
Reviews.Author: O.Rodriguest
Reviews.Content: So this tablet isn't compatible with GooglePlay store apps. You can download most of the stuff you want illegally, but the tablet doesn't run it reliably. I'm using it as a reader, for quickly checking email, and typing notes in class. I bought the tablet as part of an effort to digitize all of my pdfs and notes and eventually make them all searchable. I wasn't expecting anything fancy, I just expected it not to crash with one app open.But with this tablet, I've had apps just not work and not open. I'm in class and my note-taking app stops working or the tablet takes 10 minutes to turn on. Either way, I end up using a piece of paper. I'll be able to open some word documents for viewing, and not others.It's very frustrating and there doesn't seem to any rhyme or reason.Really, just save up for something better or buy a used netbook. At this point, a $.50 notebook is more stable.

Reviews.Title: Coby SUCKS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Traci Chute
Reviews.Content: This one does anyway. This is my second one, and I'm not happy at ALL!!! Very upset and disappointed in Amazon for selling this item. The first one I bought, had to be returned, due to a problem with the mini USB port on the tablet. Now this second one, that was sent to replace the first, is HORRIBLE!!! Every day it loses my apps, ebooks, and has to be reset and sd card reloaded. I'm fed up with this brand! I FINALLY talked to someone at Amazon, and I'm now getting a refund, which in turn I'll use to buy another brand.

Reviews.Title: Good product 100% Recommended
Reviews.Author: Jean Carlos Contreras
Reviews.Content: Good product 100% RecommendedChoosing this rating because it is a great productI would recommend this product to everyone100% Recommended

Reviews.Title: The price says it all
Reviews.Author: K Patrick "KPat"
Reviews.Content: The price shows its quality. Customer service doesn't exist. Its not compatible with google play. In order for it to be so you have to root it and good luck doing that. Its near impossible because you cant access the boot sector like you normally should. Its a pain in the butt. The screen cracked within a month of purchase and all it took was a simple flick of the wrist. Cheap construction. A total bummer. Icecream sandwhich is a plus. But if you want quality look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: K. D'Aleo "Kristen"
Reviews.Content: Not an Ipad of course, but it will do! Great for games, nice sized screen, and works very well! Glad we bought it

Reviews.Title: My first tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: ...I choose this item for price and an entry into something new...the Android world.  Although, I am fed up with Windows OS; I think Apple (Ipad)is 10X overpriced and just longed for something to play with....and download Kindle books.  I love it for that alone.  I find it impossible to download the google apps from google play store...Everything about google is stupid, except the search engine in my opinion.  Once again, for a reading appliance and email machine this tablet is great.

Reviews.Title: Product exploded and caught on fire in my 3 year olds hands.
Reviews.Author: Joshua J. Smith "Apriil"
Reviews.Content: At first I thought this tablet was excellent for the price. It was exactly what we were looking for until ome day while my 3 year son was playing with it, it started to make a hissing noise, smoking, battery exploded and caught on fire. Luckily I was next to him to knock it out of his hands right away unfortunately onto my just over a year new couch. God forbid I wasn't there. He was not hurt, just scared and in shock. He still is upset when he remembers that his tablet is gone and what happened. His twin sister has the same one and that was placed in a metal box and stored in the garage.I did contact the company and we are still in the middle of this ordeal. I do not reccommend buying until they fix this issue.

Reviews.Title: Seriously?
Reviews.Author: Ginger B. "Noire"
Reviews.Content: I received the device on a Friday afternoon. Up until Tuesday morning, it wouldn't connect to the wi-fi. Every other electronic equipment in my house works fine (and i have at least 3), but this tablet won't connect. It keeps saying "Out of range" when I'm sitting only 7 feet from the router.I called Coby on Tuesday morning, and was told to reset the device. It worked fine for about 2 minutes, then same problem started again. It won't connect to the wi-fi!I've only had it for 4 days, so i'm going to give it another 3 days before i send it back.The 9-inch form factor is perfect for me (thus the 2 stars), but the thing has to work!PS: They advertise it as being 1lb, put i put it on a scale, and it's actually 1.25 lbs.Will update soon...*Update 1: June 6, 2012 2-stars rating changed to 3So I returned the first unit to Amazon, and got a replacement. It took 1 hour and $50 for my ISP provider to make the tablet connect to the home wi-fi.Calling Coby customer care for over an hour did not resolve the issue.I had to pay $50 to my ISP provider for them to figure it out for me because the tablet is not their product.I also noticed that the tablet does not come with flash player already installed, so some websites do not work. I've downloaded a flash player from Getjar, yet still no success. I have to spend another half hour or so with their customer service today so they can tell me what to do.So overall this tablet cost me $250, which is 50 bucks way more than I was willing to pay for it. If you add in the over 2 days spent trying to get it to do the number one thing i bought it for (connect to internet), that irks.Depending on the wi-fi settings in your house or wherever you try to connect, this unit might not work. Whereby my old HP Touchpad connects everywhere, every time, without a hitch.**Update 2: June 11, 2012 - 3 stars rating changed to 2I finally found a flash player that works, but it only works with the native browser, not the Google chrome browser that i downloaded.I had to do my own research online to find the right Flash player, because Coby customer support was completely useless. The version that they suggested that i use didn't work, and they became very dismissive over the phone and rushed me off the phone when they saw that what they were suggesting wasn't working. Sad!So all and all, I will go from 3 stars rating to 2 stars because i shouldn't have gone through all that i went through to have this tablet do the No. 1 thing I bought for.It costs me overall $250, too much of my time and a lot of frustration.***Update 3: June 27, 2012 - 2 stars rating changed to 3; Would have given 3.5 if it was possible.Everything now works, except it's very slow. My small laptop with half the Ram of this tablet processes things faster. The tablet is very slow, no matter in what application I'm in, no matter how many applications are running at the same time. The sound is very low as well, so i use the headphones a lot.Not being able to use my Google calendar in it sucks big time! I removed the Google chrome browser and replaced it with Dolphin HD. Much better.So all and all, it took 3 weeks of troubleshooting, extensive internet search, hours over the phone with Coby CS, 2 returns and exchanges to have this thing work properly.If you plan to do anything other than basic internet surfing, you will get frustrated with this tablet if you don't have tons of patience.

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: Dolemite
Reviews.Content: Let me first start by saying that this device is terrible.  Ok, now here is why.1. It is running 4.03 without access to play store.  For some this is not an issue, but most people need apps.  When you hear of an app that you really want, be prepared to not be able to get it.  They give you an app store called get jar, which is a joke.  Get jar has no apps at all.  With some Androids you can manually load Play Store, but this device is locked down.  Impossible.2.  This device is locked down.  I could not even browse files on my own SD card, let alone play a movie or listen to music on my SD card.  When I tried to download a file browser from crap jar I could not find one, but then again I could not search for one.  Every search that actually managed to work came back with the same results.  If I searched for butter I would get angry birds, if I searched for word processor I would get angry birds.  Crap Jar3.  The screen has an issue.  When I would run searches on the web, it would erase what I entered in the search bar when I pressed the search button.  This happened on several different sites, which means that it is the browser or the tablet, and being as I cannot load a different browser I have to live with it.4.  The device is fast, but that is because there is nothing on it.Complete junk.Oh and you might want to carry around a pair of toe nail clippers to get the SD card in and out as regular human fingers just dont seem to cut it.Oh and the usb port is an off standard, so dont go thinking you can use any cables you already own.

Reviews.Title: Surfing and email, yes.  Word processing and lots of apps, no.
Reviews.Author: Kellena
Reviews.Content: I am a student with no laptop and no smartphone.  I have been trying to save money for a tablet for a while, and then received an Amazon gift certificate for Christmas.  This was the only tablet that was completely covered by the gift certificate, and after much soul-searching I decided to "spend it all in one place" and go for it.  I am thrilled to be able to see my school's website and class power points on the go - however, it took a lot to get there.The touch screen and on screen keyboard are better than expected.  The wi-fi is intuitive and excellent.  The pre-installed web browser was not supported by my college's online program at all.  I tried installing Chrome (the suggested browser) - however, as noted in most other reviews, this tablet cannot access google play, and play is the only place to download chrome.  So I tried installing firefox from Mozilla's website - which redirected me to google play.  I searched the pre-installed app store - GetJar - however NOTHING I attempted to download from there would work, it would give me an error message.  So then I installed Amazon apps.  That got me *some* apps (many are not even available for download onto this tablet)... however, every time I exited out of Amazon apps and then tried to enter back into it, the appstore wouldn't load and would give me only a black screen and search bar that did nothing.  I worked around this by uninstalling and re-installing Amazon apps each time I wanted to use it, which was tedious.  Meanwhile, I still couldn't get a browser that worked on my school website.  So, all I could do was check my email and facebook, and view pictures from my sd card.  Definitely not worth $100.  A friend found a link to download firefox after some serious searching.  Once I installed firefox, I was able to connect to my school's website and view our online syllabi and power points, but each time a screen loads it still gives me an error message that I must click out of.  That raised this from two stars to three.  Finally, I found. on the Coby wesite, instructions on how to get GetJar to work (you have to access GetJar from the Coby website, not the widget that comes pre-installed).  However, the GetJar site ended up not being worth any of the hassle.  But, Pandora installed and works great.  I can read any office document, but need to pay $15 if I want to be able to CREATE anything, inlcuding any word documents.  Back down to two stars.  I ordered a keyboard/case, and then a usb-to-mini-usb adapter to make it work, and it hooked up instantly and worked with no problems, so that brought it back to three stars.  I am planning on trying the reset described in an earlier review and hoping that google play will then work - but I am not holding my breath.Another serious problem that I have not yet solved is its complete refusal to record sound.  It plays songs fine, but the camera (front facing only, so can really only be used for skyping and the like) is very poor quality, and will NOT record sound.  An email to Coby customer support has gone unanswered.  Apps that have high star ratings don't work either.  So no recording of class lectures with this baby!If you need the ability to compose word documents you will have to pay for an upgrade to the pre-installed office program at $15.  If you want to record sound it will cost you more - perhaps a microphone, or better yet a completely different gadget at $30 or more.  If you want to take pictures, again you will have to buy a different gadget - either a phone with a camera or a camera itself - this one has its camera facing the screen and is poor quality and zero flash.  But if you want to be able to surf the web and check your email on a screen larger than a phone, this one will do it.In summary, had I been able to afford a slightly more new-technology or bigger brand tablet, I would never give this tablet a second thought.  However, considering that if this tablet had not been available I wouldn't have one at all, it isn't all THAT bad.  Better than having none at all, but if you can afford a slightly higher quality brand, do so.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids Getting Stuff to work on it sucks
Reviews.Author: Anthony james
Reviews.Content: Nothing works on these.  Purchased for my kids to put ebooks on.  So I purchased books for ebooks.com and of they come int the standard epub.  Well Android on this system does not recognize adobe editions.  So all of the ebooks I purchased for my kids don't work.  Over $150 for books and they are limited to read them on my mac book.Where is the standardization.  JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Leaves a lot to be desired
Reviews.Author: locard16309
Reviews.Content: I purcahased this tablet to use while I sent my zenithink in for repairs. The coby doesn't feel natural in my hand, it's too flat , it  doesn't mesh with my hand. Also I learned the hard way that since it doesn't meet googles android operating system requirements that it is not recognised by the app store and you can't download anything from it. Now this almost makes this tablet a paperweight right there. It does have its own vesion of an app store called the "get jar" but it has such a limited selection that its next to useless. If that wasn't enough the browser constantly freezes and I get the dreaded browser not responding prompt and have to push wait and then wait for it to respond. The dictionary is all but empty and the spell check /auto complete appears to have a mind of its own. Having used the zenithink and the samsung for extended periods of time, my opinion is that this tablet is way overpriced and needs a year maybe two in furthur development before its consumer ready.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: I am extremely disappointed with this tablet. It is slow and the screen keeps freezing.  I wish I would have waited and got a laptop. Please do not buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Product didnot work after the first recharge
Reviews.Author: Saisri
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet thinking that it was great value for the price quoted and also it came from coby and was being sold on Amazon. it worked fine the first time i used and once the battery died, i put it for recharging. That was it - it never worked again. it refused to start and i missed the 30 days return policy as i could not return it back before the expiry date. i think one should not buy a product when it the only one being sold in that price range as every other andriod 4 tablet is being sold at a minimum of 290+ where this was being sold for 100$.

Reviews.Title: Coby
Reviews.Author: Mark Jackson
Reviews.Content: If the only reason you buy is for price, you will be happy. If there is anything else, you won't be. Not really compatible

Reviews.Title: It will not charge
Reviews.Author: Dr. M. Simmons
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a deal and it turned out to be a waste of money.  It was average while it worked but the batter eventually stopped recharging.  It is impossible to find a charger for this item, that is if it is the charger that is the problem.  Instead of saving money on this purchase I am out $170.00 which could have been used to go toward an iPad.

Reviews.Title: fair product.

Reviews.Content: Not great for the money/apps. Gear apps for kids/games. Not great with some readinngs, no audio, can't even download any audio from this tablet. I am very dissapointed with'it. Good for kids.

Reviews.Title: A waste of money!
Reviews.Author: Deejay
Reviews.Content: This tablet is  good for a person who has no knowledge about tablets, a person who would just check emails and surfing the net.Pros:-big screen-cheap-nice to watch movies on it-it acts as a keyboard when writing message-HDMI, USB portsCons:-awkard rectangle shape-horrible app store-pre installed apps suck-no google play or netflix-takes forever to download apps-very slow- Doesn't really recognize your SD card. There is no file app to look through or open up ext sd card files.-speakers are horribleThe only good thing about this tablet is the size don't waste your money. I did download the amazon app store which was better than getjar.

Reviews.Content: The Tablet was not user friendly. It was hard to go from folder to folder Surfing the net was equally as hard.

Reviews.Title: Slow and no apps

Reviews.Content: I returned this tablet the same day I got it. I couldn't load Facebook mobile or Firefox. When viewing my e-mail in it's browser it ran VERY slowly. Didn't like it at all.

Reviews.Content: this product is exelent bought it fr my sister in law she is enjoying this product everyday she look at it

Reviews.Title: i wouldnt if i were u

Reviews.Content: Horrible tablet will b returning it doesn't even run all of its own apps very disappointed guess u get what u pay for

Reviews.Title: BAD TABLET!!!
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my boys for Christmas, I thought this would be a wonderful Christmas gift.  I got these and immediately wanted to set them up for the boys.  We got them both set up and now I can't get one of them back on.  We have tried to charge it, but it still will not come on.  For $100 I figured I would get a good product the boys could both enjoy.  Now one of my boys has to wait for me to ship it and get a refund so i can go out to best buy and actually buy a tablet i know we can rely on.  This is the worst tablet I have ever seen, I am not happy with this at all.  I will let everyone know not to buy a Coby tablet.  I have used amazon in the past and my boyfriend orders stuff off amazon religiously, but now we are both very unsatisfied.  I do not plan on ordering from Amazon anymore.  I would rather pay the extra money to have a good product I know will be good.  This was a terrible experience I am not willing to take again.  VERY UNHAPPY customer.  :(  I will get a refund for the tablet and never shop on here again.  I thought we actually found an awesome website, but we can't trust it.

Reviews.Title: Boo!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This product is poor. I bought this for my 9year old son thinking, it's not to spendy, I'll give it a try! I think many parents think the same. DON'T get it! Unless your child did something horrible and you want to punish them by severe disappointment!It has a sub par app store called, get jar. It has junk apps. You can't get google play off of it to make it better. I had to go to amazon and download their app store, it's ok but it's not google play.Getjar also doesn't have Netflix.Oh and by the way it's super buggy, it says if it won't turn on(and at some point it won't, take a paper clip to the reset button. Did that and it still wouldn't turn back on.)A working tablet is a must,having an app store that isn't junk also a must. If you just want to surf the web, watch YouTube or check email you may be happy with it, if it doesn't stop working. Oh, the fb app is junky too...We are Returning it  and spending  the extra money on a better tablet. Nexus 7 or a kindle fire hd.This is not worth the frustration. If I had the choose to buy this or have nothing,I would choose nothing. This is junk.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk

Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my childrens Christmas.....they are a pieces of Trash.......I have worked all day trying to get an App to instal and nothing will work.....They ruined my childrens Christmas! They will be going back to the store as soon as we can get there!!!  I would NOT recommend any to buy these....Especially for a child Christmas gift...They are left disappointed on Cristmas Day!!!  Thanks COBY KYROS!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Robin Blackburn
Reviews.Content: This is not a tablet you want to buy a waste of money you can't do much of anything on it I am thinking of returning mine to be honest

Reviews.Title: Description does not match actual item
Reviews.Author: kwiltz55
Reviews.Content: The description clearly says 2 2.0 USB and 2 3.0 USB.  There is one USB and 1 HDMI.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: not what i was expecting
Reviews.Author: Dan "My first novel will be available when i ...
Reviews.Content: The good.Movie player and music player apps are great and can watch movies from SD card without issues.web browser is fine and does all you would require (unless you want to watch any flash player content)The Bad.First of all, the battery can last as short as 45 mins of constant use.cannot run flash player, so no access to netflix.The inbuilt memory wants to put all apps on the 250mb boot drive meaning you fill the memory real quick and after 20 or so apps your storage is full (even with a massive SD card)The real kicker and why i am so dissapointed with this machine, is the fact that it is not compatible with the google play android market.So 90% of the apps i wanted to use were unavailable to me.Getting the machine to boot up at times can be a nightmare as it sits there for up to 10 mins showing the coby screen.After only having the thing for a week or so i have had to use a pin to reset it 6 times as it can just lock up and do nothing.not a good buy imo.

Reviews.Title: Awful  MID1042-8
Reviews.Author: William Masterson
Reviews.Content: Purchased one of these new.  It would not connect with the router unless your were holding it virtually on top of it. All my other laptops of various makes, HP, Accer, Dell and 1st gen Ipad, Wii game console etc. detect and hook up with the rotor which is one story down.  They also pick up all of the other routers operating in the neighborhood within a block or so.  Not this one. In the instruction booklet it says you must be within 300 feet of the router - try 3 feet.When it did hook up, the browser would not open any web pages.  I sent it back and will bite the bullet and spring for another Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Not off to a good start!
Reviews.Author: Kvaughn
Reviews.Content: Just received the product, pulled it out of the box, got 100% charge on the battery and it will NOT let me turn on the WiFi! I have a wireless router in addition to a personal hotspot available for connection, but the device wont even let me turn WiFi on to connect to any of the available connections! I guess you really do get what you pay for. Went to the Coby sight for troubleshooting...no help.

Reviews.Title: COby MDI1042 Poor performance
Reviews.Author: downunder56
Reviews.Content: Can't ask more for the price, but expected the item to perform better based on previous reviews listed. It constantly locks up. Camera has very bad resolution, does not have the reverse camera and the quality is very bad. While using Adobe reader or other epub reader the performance is very slow, screen turning is not as I expected. Very disappointed with its performance, not a good buy. There are other products of similar price that are much better than this one.

Reviews.Title: Wtf
Reviews.Author: Dani
Reviews.Content: My son just got this yesterday and already this so much going wrong. At just 35% battery it flashes off and on continusly I haven't fully charged it yet but that can't be normal. Google play won't download and google plus keeps crashing as soon as it opens. The app center that comes on there barely have anything, Netflix took two times to download it on here. I hate that there is only a front camera so I guess he can only take pics of himself. I am so irked, I hope this is just a defected one which is still bad but this can't be as good as it get.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, slow, you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Dcearley
Reviews.Content: I was originally excited to see such a great deal on a large tablet. I ordered it right away. It turns out you can't get any good apps because you can't use google play app store. I tried rooting the thing, but it was complex. If you do searches for drivers, rooting or google play, you will see what everyone else is experiencing. It was also sluggish at times. Save yourself the time and energy and avoid this item. I have decided to pay the $200 more and get an iPad. I have an android phone, so I understand the OS and how it works.. I like my phone (although I liked my iPhone better).BOTTOM LINE: SKIP THIS ITEM, THERE IS A REASON IT IS SO CHEAP!!!!

Reviews.Content: It has a few apps that you can download, but not the ones you want.  Like facebook or netflixs.  I got this for my mother so it would be easier for her to navigate then her computer.  I am sending it back!!!
